description: Shop Samsung 75” Class DU6900 Series Crystal UHD 4K Smart Tizen TV (2024) at Best Buy. Find low everyday prices and buy online for delivery or in-store pick-up. Price Match Guarantee.

reviews.name: Clear picture!
reviews.reviewBody:
I love my new TV! The picture quality is amazing as it is crystal clear. My son is enjoying watching his cartoons so vividly. I recently hosted a boxing night event and it was great to be able to see the fight on this tv. 
It was very easy to setup and comes programmed with lots of apps and free chanel’s. The price point is shocking as I got a wonderful deal for the size and quality. 

My only complaint is that while the sound is clear it’s on the lower end. I purchased a sound bar and that connery was easily addressed. 

awesome buy!

reviews.name: My TV
reviews.reviewBody: Had my TV for a week I’m loving it delivery was quick

reviews.name: Excellent Experience
reviews.reviewBody: Had a phenomenal experience at the Best Buy in Burbank Illinois. I was concerned, going to purchase a 75 inch television by myself. (A woman) The salesman made me very comfortable and I truly love my Samsung smart Television I purchased for $680 out the door. What more could you ask for?

primaryImage.altText: SAMSUNG Crystal UHD

descriptions.long: This essential TV features a range of contrast and color and smart capabilities. Enjoy your content with richer details, brighter images and clearer resolution with 4K Upscaling

specifications.definition: Devices carrying the ENERGY STAR service mark, such as computer products and peripherals, kitchen appliances, and other products, generally use 20% to 30% less energy than required by federal standards.

The number of discrete channels of sound output. This can be a single number or multiple numbers separated by decimal(s). The first number is the primary, horizontally directed audio channels. The number after the first decimal, if applicable, is the number of subwoofer outputs or channels. The number after the second decimal, if applicable, is the number of height or atmospheric channels designed to immerse the listener by producing overhead sound effects.

There are a few HDR formats that tell the TV or other HDR-compatible product how to best utilize its capabilities to display HDR content. HDR technology can support one or multiple formats, each with various benefits to picture quality.
The number and type of USB ports the product has.
The manner in which a device sends data to another device over a short distance without the use of wires or cables.
Refers to the number of pixels, both horizontally and vertically, used to capture video/images. The higher the resolution the finer the detail that can be seen.
The ability for a device to perform a specific function, or functions, based on a spoken command, that is received by a microphone integrated with the device.
The out of box width of the item. Width is measured as the horizontal distance from one side of the item to the other as it would be primarily used or placed.
Feature that blocks television programming if it has a content rating outside of the acceptable rating(s) configured by the user.
The horizontal measurement of the stand/base, or the distance from the outside of one leg to the outside of the opposite leg, as it is attached to the product.

Edge-lit: lights are on the edges of the display with ~10 zones of vertical LEDs. Direct-lit: lights are on the edges and behind the screen for more light uniformity than Edge-lit. Full array: direct-lit with local dimming for greater contrast with up to 100 zones of LEDs.
The available language options for displayed text or captions.

The Electronic Product Environmental Assessment Tool (EPEAT) was designed to provide an environmental assessment tool for purchasers. In order to qualify for EPEAT, a product must meet all 23 required criteria.
VESA wall mount standards refer to the spacing of screw holes built into a TV in order to fit with standard TV wall mounts. These standards are implemented into most TVs and monitors.
Casts the screen of one device onto another wirelessly, using a common protocol (typically Bluetooth).

Just like a computer, a smart TV needs an operating system (also called a smart platform) in order to access the Internet, connect with entertainment apps, and play streaming content. Some common TV smart platforms are; Roku TV, Android TV, and Chromecast.
Whether the stand can adjust to have more than one measurement either between the legs or the base itself.

Size of the screen, measured diagonally from corner to corner.
The number of frames per second the device can produce natively without enhancement. Higher rates help produce smooth, seamless pictures.
The Bluetooth specification formalized by the Bluetooth Special Interest Group. All versions of the Bluetooth standard are backwards compatible with previous versions.

features.title: PurColor
features.description: See a wide spectrum of colors than traditional RGB models with Pur Color. From green turf to an amazing sunset, you’ll enjoy true to life picture quality with our innovative color technology.

features.title: 4K Upscaling
features.description: Get a clearer picture for more of your shows and videos. 4K Upscaling transforms each pixel.

features.title: Motion Xcelerator
features.description: Watch your content smoothly while experiencing less lag and blur.

features.title: Object Tracking Sound Lite
features.description: You’ll hear 3D surround sound that follows the movement on screen using our incredible virtual top channel audio.

features.title: Mega Contrast
features.description: Automatically adjusts the brightness and contrast and reduces the difference between light and dark areas. HDR

features.title: HDR
features.description: Take in an impressive spectrum of colors and fine details, even in the darkest scenes. Brightness and contrast are automatically dialed into their ideal levels in every frame so you can see your content as it’s meant to be seen.

features.description: Only Samsung gives you the power to unlock incredible sound when you pair a Samsung TV with a Q series or S series soundbar.¹

features.description: See content as it was meant to be viewed, in dazzling 4K. The processor automatically transforms color, sound and more.

features.title: Samsung TV Plus
features.description: Turn on and tune into free live TV with just your WiFi connection. From popular shows and movies to local news and world sports Samsung TV Plus gives you instant access to live streaming TV content to satisfy any interest, occasion or mood.²

reviews.name: Good for the Price
reviews.reviewBody: The first time I purchased this TV, it has a bucn of red dots. So I called best buy & let them know, so they just swapped it out for a new one. As of now no problems with the TV. I wish the control had voice command. The control has a lot of buttons, were not used to that because we had a Roku TV. In my picture ignore the lines it from my blinds.

reviews.name: Great TV for the price/size
reviews.reviewBody: I've slowly been switching my TVs from Vizio and Samsung to LG as I like the quality and ease of use of the LG products (and the ThinQ app).  This one was for my son's room so we bought a bigger one as he will be going off to life/college/whatever soon so I was pleased to get a terrific price on a larger tv.  He set it up quickly, and the light weight of it made it easy to mount.  He has a sound bar but decided not to use it since the sound quality is so good.

reviews.name: Random horizontal lines on screen
reviews.reviewBody: I replaced my 10 year old LG tv because the screen blacked out. I did my research, and decided to go with the 2024 65" Class UT75 Series LED 4K UHD Smart webOS TV because  it's LG latest tv, and it was within my budget.  I purchased the tv on June 2nd 2024. Brought it home, hooked it up on the wall mount, turn it on, and set it up.  Pictures and colors were beautiful, I was really happy with the purchase until random lines started to show up on the screen (photo attached) 12 days later.  I was very disappointed. The lines lasted for a couple days. I was getting ready to return the tv until the lines stopped. I gave the tv a couple of days to see if the lines reappear. It never did, so I keep the tv. It's been good since.

reviews.name: Amazing Smart TV
reviews.reviewBody: Great TV. Color is amazing, Setup not all that bad. Its search engine would not let me connect to Peacock. Otherwise it let me connect all my paid subscriptions.  I bought the 77 inch. I feel closer to a sporting event then being there in person.  The sound is good, I bought a sound bar to enhance the sound. Really didn’t need to do that but like a deeper bass for listening to music. I think this is the best choice of smart television that are out on the market today.

reviews.name: Excellent Panel!
reviews.reviewBody:
Originally I wanted the C2 77 because it was a a lot cheaper, and not too much worse than the C3 77. But after weeks of failed deliveries from Best Buy canceling my appointments, I had to go to the store and talk with a manager to see what was going on. For a bit more due to my troubles, he was able to upgrade to a C3. And I will say, given the circumstances and what I originally wanted for the TV, I am very happy with it.... 

With that being said, I don't think as many people would be buying this TV with the C2 (worse but far cheaper, and now apparently sold out...) G2/G3 (brighter, MLA heatsink, but more expensive) as options, as well as the allure of the QD-OLED for S90C and S95C. But I did not want to go with QD-OLED since I think the technology is still too immature and per testing from RTINGS on burn-in susceptibility, QD-OLED is more prone to burn-in than WOLED. Though in all honesty, if I had a higher budget (originally I was going for the C277 which is $$800 less than C3, which is what I spent), I think it would be better investment to get the G3 if you can afford it. But as far as the picture quality from this TV (and I did see them side by side in store: G3, C3, S90C), it's excellent and even amongst the other models I am incredibly satisfied for the price.

reviews.name: This Oled is beautiful.
reviews.reviewBody: I have a 77” that I will never regret buying. It is without a doubt the best TV i have owned it is beautiful from the thin screen, to the actual picture quality you cannot beat it for the price. I recommend purchasing any movie that has the IMAX feature so you can truly have a movie theater experience in your home!! The user interface is very simple to use and even has a wand that is controlled via controller to navigate through the menus much easier and way faster than other brands interfaces. The app selection is amazing and removes the need for external plugged in devices!! There is an awesome split screen feature that is great when there is more than one game being played as well. The audio and visual settings help get you the exact picture quality you are looking for and it will leave you speechless once you get it how you want it. Definitely recommend this amazing TV to anyone!!!

reviews.name: QD-Oled Colors Pop.
reviews.reviewBody:
I returned my LG C2 when I went into BestBuy and saw the picture on the Samsung S90C.
 The picture you get with the QD-oled is so much brighter and vibrant than what you can get from a regular oled tv.
The picture is bright and great when you have a room with a lot of light. The colors on this thing just pop.
 I took the S90C home before I returned the LG so I had a couple of days to compare the 2 side by side. I was worried because the Samsung doesn't support Dolby Vision. I watched a few Dolby Vision movies on the Lg (which supports Dolby Vision) and the Samsung. I do not feel like anything looked better on the LG. I had both Tv's settings on filmmaker mode. A couple scenes looked a little different but in my opinion not better with the Dolby vision supported tv.
  I did like the Lg's webos better than the Samsung's Tizen but with the picture I get on the Samsung I can deal with it.
The LG is a awesome tv but this one is just on another level. 
  Even my wife loves it. She usually doesn't care or comment on things like that. She told me she has to watch all her favorite shows over again because of how much more detail she sees on this tv.
 I play PS5 on this a lot and it is great for gaming. No lag and again the colors just pop.
I did have a problem with getting the Samsung TV plus app to work. I found that if you change the dns setting to 8.8.8.8 it works fine.
 Another nice thing is this tv has smart calibration and you can calibrate it with your android or ios phone. I'm not sure how accurate it is but it did make a noticable difference and  the picture looks great. 
 As far as the sound, It is pretty good for tv speakers. The Lg did sound a little better in my opinion. The sound on the samsung is good enough for what we watch. Some may want a soundbar , but for me I don't think it's needed.
 The panel is thin, almost too thin. I was nervous when moving the tv.
 The solar powered remote is nice. No more looking for AAA batteries. You can also charge it with a usb-c cable.
 The reason for the 4 stars instead of 5 is because of the Tizen system. It can be a little slow at times. I noticed that it was really slow when downloading and using the apps for the first time. It seems to load the apps quicker now.

reviews.name: If you have never had a OLED TV, You need one!
reviews.reviewBody:
I did a lot of research before purchasing this OLED TV and I have not been disappointed.

Pros: Outstanding Picture, Black is absolutely black, the colors are vibrant (as you would expect from a OLED screen and the entire reason for buying one), Remote Control is rechargeable via USB C cable or solar (yes that is nice). Lots of Smart TV Content including the Samsung Channel. You can set up the TV to return to the previous content when you power ON the TV, a nice feature that works most of the time (Youtube TV has it's issues, but that is the Youtube TV app, not the TV).  Example: Watching Pluto Stargate channel, power off the TV, power on the TV the following day, Pluto comes back up to the Stargate channel.  I was impressed with the overall sound quality, minus a few cons listed below.  Back to the picture quality, the brightness is very good, I actually do not notice much of a difference from my previous TV.

Cons: Very small remote (just like a Fire Stick remote), and few buttons.  The remote Volume Up/Down and Channel Up/Down buttons are short toggle up/down switches and if you accidentally press the Volume straight down, it mutes the TV.  Larger fingers will find this difficult to hold and use.  I do not like the remote.  I have an older Samsung remote control that has a ton of buttons and is easy to physically use, and I have easy access to features that I'd otherwise have to jump through a few screens using the original remote.  So the remote is a con for me, skinny fingers will probably like it.  The screen thickness is flimy, easy to bend even though the back is made of a metal sheet.  There are special instructions on how to handle this screen, otherwise you can break the display so my advice, use two people and follow the instructions.  So it's not very rugged is my point.  I would rather have a slightly thicker screen that was more ridged to resist damage.  Moving this TV with one person, while I did do it (and I'm 62 years of age), it was difficult due to the weight and flimsy screen.  The audio, while most of the time is fine, will often drop to a whisper level.  This becomes irritating when a movie starts out at a comfortable level and then you are straining to hear some scenes.  Audio "Auto Level" does not appear to work very well, at least for me.  My previous TV never had this issue and I'm watching the same type of content.  Maybe it's a Dolby Atmos issue?  I dropped the audio from 5 starts to 4 stars for this issue, otherwise when you can hear it, the sound is very good.  You have some bass which is nice, but don't get carried away, it's not a theater audio system.  Keep expectations real.

If you have never owned an OLED TV before and are use to an LCD TV, it will take a little getting use to the vibrant colors.  If you really examine the human skin tones, they look remarkably accurate.  All the other colors are great too, but again, it takes a little getting use to.  I have been watching older movies just to be amazed at all that I missed with my older TV's.  Just blows your mind.

And the disclaimer:  If you are not someone who can appreciate this kind of quality picture, I do not recommend you spend your money on this TV.  You can by other good quality LCD TV's for less than a third of this TV cost.

I have had this TV for about a month now and I'm very impressed overall.  I highly recommend this TV model.

reviews.name: Best TV in its price range!
reviews.reviewBody:
The Samsung S90C OLED TV stands out as a true gem in the ever-evolving world of television technology. Boasting a harmonious blend of quantum dots and OLED panels, this upper-midrange model offers a visual experience that transcends its price point. The TV excels in delivering stunning picture quality, impressive gaming features, and decent audio, making it a formidable competitor against higher-end sets from major manufacturers.

Pros:

Gorgeous Picture Quality: The marriage of quantum dots and OLED technology results in a visual masterpiece. The S90C delivers rich, precise colors, impeccable brightness, and near-infinite contrast, creating a truly immersive viewing experience.

Excellent Gaming Features: With impressively low input lag, HDMI 2.1 support, Variable Refresh Rate (VRR), and Auto Low-Latency Mode (ALLM), the S90C caters to gamers seeking a responsive and visually captivating gaming experience.

Decent Audio for a TV: The 40-watt, 2.1 channel sound system supports Dolby Atmos and Object Tracking Sound Lite, providing audio that, while not groundbreaking, surpasses the standard TV audio experience.

Equipped with ATSC 3.0 Tuner: Future-proofed with an ATSC 3.0 tuner, the S90C allows users to enjoy 4K over-the-air broadcasts, adding versatility to its entertainment capabilities.

Cons:

Oversaturated HDR Colors in Standard Mode: The Standard mode exhibits oversaturation in HDR colors, impacting the accuracy of color reproduction. However, this can be mitigated by selecting the appropriate picture mode.

 TV Interface: While functional, the Tizen smart interface is somewhat clunky, with navigation being less intuitive compared to other interfaces.

Design and Build:
The S90C impresses not only with its performance but also with its sleek design. Its ultra-thin profile and minimalistic aesthetics make it a visually appealing addition to any living space. Whether wall-mounted or on a stand, the TV exudes style and sophistication.

Conclusion:
In conclusion, the Samsung S90C OLED TV stands tall as a testament to the advancements in display technology. Offering a captivating visual experience, commendable gaming features, and a sleek design, it outshines its midrange competitors. While a few minor drawbacks exist, the S90C undoubtedly earns its place as one of the best TVs in its price range, delivering exceptional value for the discerning buyer.

The Samsung OLED experience doesn’t stop there shifting adventures is a breeze with access to the latest Smart TV apps and Samsung Gaming Hub. ¹ ¹ High speed internet connection, additional gaming service subscriptions and compatible controller required.

specifications.definition: Devices carrying the ENERGY STAR service mark, such as computer products and peripherals, kitchen appliances, and other products, generally use 20% to 30% less energy than required by federal standards.

The number of discrete channels of sound output. This can be a single number or multiple numbers separated by decimal(s). The first number is the primary, horizontally directed audio channels. The number after the first decimal, if applicable, is the number of subwoofer outputs or channels. The number after the second decimal, if applicable, is the number of height or atmospheric channels designed to immerse the listener by producing overhead sound effects.

There are a few HDR formats that tell the TV or other HDR-compatible product how to best utilize its capabilities to display HDR content. HDR technology can support one or multiple formats, each with various benefits to picture quality.
The number and type of USB ports the product has.
This is technology that's specific to a TV brand (sometimes called proprietary technology). Here you'll see terms related to picture quality, brightness, processors and more.

specifications.definition: Surround sound systems use multiple audio channels and speakers to create an immersive sound experience for the listener. There are also various proprietary technologies that imitate this kind of sound via a device's built-in speakers or soundbar.
The manner in which a device sends data to another device over a short distance without the use of wires or cables.
Refers to the number of pixels, both horizontally and vertically, used to capture video/images. The higher the resolution the finer the detail that can be seen.
The ability for a device to perform a specific function, or functions, based on a spoken command, that is received by a microphone integrated with the device.
The out of box width of the item. Width is measured as the horizontal distance from one side of the item to the other as it would be primarily used or placed.
Feature that blocks television programming if it has a content rating outside of the acceptable rating(s) configured by the user.
The horizontal measurement of the stand/base, or the distance from the outside of one leg to the outside of the opposite leg, as it is attached to the product.

specifications.definition: Part of a group of the same product type with similar features.
The device features an interface that allows for the connection of headphones.
The device is capable of connecting to another device in order to send or receive streaming content. Share content from your mobile device to your TV or vice versa.
Predicted cost of operating the product under average conditions for one year.
Smart, or smart-capable devices are able to connect directly to your home network in order to stream content from the Internet, run Internet-based apps, or connect to other smart devices.
Proprietary technologies produced in addition to the Refresh Rate that smooth out faster moving pictures to reduce blur and pixelation.
The group size measurement of a screen. This differs from a screen size measured diagonally from corner to corner.
An input that receives uncompressed HDMI signals over a category cable point-to-point, up to 100 meters, from a transmitter.
Near field microphones require you to be very close to the device for the sound to be picked up. Far field microphones allow you to speak to a device from a distance.
Indicates the appropriate environment product was designed to be used in.
Amount of power needed to support an electrical current.
The text version of spoken audio displayed on the screen. Devices that can display closed captioning typically have the option to toggle the feature on or off.
This input is used to connect devices such as antennas or cable boxes to a TV via a coaxial cable.
Compatible with or able to be connected to other smart devices or applications.
A system that converts language text into speech.
Improves clarity of dialogue in audio playback. This is typically achieved with dedicated speakers and/or technology that separates dialogue from the rest of the audio in order to make it clearer.
The total number of USB ports including all generations and versions.
Measurement of electrical power.
A digital assistant built into the device that uses voice commands to answer questions and control smart devices.
An HDR-compatible 4K TV or other HDR-compatible product displays HDR video content when it's available from sources like 4K Ultra HD Blu-ray Discs and 4K streaming services.
The available language options for displayed text or captions.

The ATSC TV Tuner is a component built into conventional TV sets or other devices for receiving over-the-air broadcast TV without a cable/satellite box. Digital tuners may be purchased separately and connected to a device if it does not have one built in.
Predicted amount of electricity needed to operate the product under average conditions for one year.
The number and type of connectors used to connect to an external display.
Generally, these technologies allow syncing between a computer/console game's frame rate and the device's refresh rate for a smoother display without tearing.

The Electronic Product Environmental Assessment Tool (EPEAT) was designed to provide an environmental assessment tool for purchasers. In order to qualify for EPEAT, a product must meet all 23 required criteria.
VESA wall mount standards refer to the spacing of screw holes built into a TV in order to fit with standard TV wall mounts. These standards are implemented into most TVs and monitors.
Casts the screen of one device onto another wirelessly, using a common protocol (typically Bluetooth).

Indicates whether the device features descriptive video service (DVS). This service provides narration of key elements in the program, such as actions, costumes, and scene changes, to help engage visually-impaired audiences.

Just like a computer, a smart TV needs an operating system (also called a smart platform) in order to access the Internet, connect with entertainment apps, and play streaming content. Some common TV smart platforms are; Roku TV, Android TV, and Chromecast.
Whether the stand can adjust to have more than one measurement either between the legs or the base itself.
Streaming services and other programs are available on this device. Keep in mind, there may be more services supported than just those shown here.
Size of the screen, measured diagonally from corner to corner.
The number of frames per second the device can produce natively without enhancement. Higher rates help produce smooth, seamless pictures.
The Bluetooth specification formalized by the Bluetooth Special Interest Group. All versions of the Bluetooth standard are backwards compatible with previous versions.

features.title: OLED Technology

Plus, with pure blacks and more than a billion shades of color, combined with 8.3 million self illuminating pixels (ultra fast switching tiny lights) reveals virtually limitless contrast

experience it all transformed into sharp 4K resolution with our high performance, AI powered processor that upgrades your content scene by scene.¹

features.title: HDR OLED
features.description: Witness the difference detail can make. With fine tuned brightness and optimized contrast made possible by self illuminating pixels, your picture is instantly enhanced as HDR OLED analyzes each scene so you can enjoy rich and accurate colors²

features.title: Pantone Validated
features.description: Enjoy color validated by industry leading experts at Pantone, so that images on the screen look as incredible as they do in real life.
From every fantastic detail on your favorite runway competition to each course of drool worthy cooking shows, experience it all in a whole new way only on Samsung screens.

features.title: Dolby Atmos and Object Tracking Sound Lite
features.description: Keep your ears on the action with Dolby Atmos and virtual top speakers that follow the story. When a dragon swoops across the screen, 3D sound moves right along with it thanks to Object Tracking Sound Lite.

Together, they can optimize all the channels to bring you a masterfully orchestrated sound experience.³

features.title: Motion Xcelerator Turbo Pro
features.description: Why go slow when you can play smooth even during super fast gaming content. Feel the thrill with smooth performance during even the fastest games and action scenes.
Keep up with the supersonic speed and catch every thrilling frame without lag or motion blur. Instead, you’ll enjoy seamless action and sensational 4K visuals at speeds up to 120Hz.⁴

The digital horizontal and vertical lens shift is very good. I had to build a diy floating shelf for this projector as it is big and heavy. I have it 13 feet away from the wall approximately  and it gives me a 125" image easily. Overall this is one of the best pixel shifting 4k projectors out there for the price.

specifications.definition: The light source's estimated length of operating time when economy mode is enabled.
Denotes the product’s visual process, sometimes manufacturer specific, used to display an image.
The light source's estimated length of operating time when normal operating mode is enabled.

The smallest opening of a lens, typically expressed in f-numbers. The larger the number, the smaller the aperture and the less light that can enter the lens. A smaller aperture creates a larger depth of field, which keeps both foreground and background in focus.

This measurement indicates what size of projected image can be produced from a certain distance. The smaller the ratio, the closer the projector can be to the screen while still producing a large image.

Measurement of the device's color light output measured accordance with standards established by the Information Display Measurements Standard (IDMS). The more lumens, the brighter the output. In large and/or well-lit environments, such as auditoriums or rooms with plenty of natural light, a higher brightness improves the color quality of the projected image.

Fixed projectors are ideal when creating an authentic theater atmosphere in your home. Often designed to stay in one place they may require significant recalibration if moved. Portable projectors, weighing around 5 pounds, are easy to move, but will still require set-up calibration and often have technology to reduce the complexity. Ultra-portable projectors are very light, often battery-powered, and ideal for on-the-go use.

Projectors with this technology are able to display images with optimal brightness, color, and detail. Because of their high-performance design, these projectors are primarily used in large venues and digital cinemas.
Measured difference between a displayed image's brightest whites and darkest blacks. The larger the first number, the more detail and color that can be displayed.
An HDR-compatible 4K TV or other HDR-compatible product displays HDR video content when it's available from sources like 4K Ultra HD Blu-ray Discs and 4K streaming services.
The number and type of connectors used to connect to an external display.
The method used to focus the device in order to view or display a sharper image.
Refers to the number of pixels, both horizontally and vertically, used to capture video/images. The higher the resolution the finer the detail that can be seen.
The out of box width of the item. Width is measured as the horizontal distance from one side of the item to the other as it would be primarily used or placed.

Measurement of the device's white light output measured in accordance with standards established by the International Organization for Standardization (ISO). The more lumens, the brighter the output. In large and/or well-lit environments, such as auditoriums or rooms with plenty of natural light, a higher brightness improves the quality of the projected image.
The out of box weight of the item.

values: Home Cinema 4010 4K 3LCD Projector with High Dynamic Range

specifications.definition: The limit to how wide a lens can be open, typically expressed in f-numbers. The smaller the number, the larger the aperture and the more light that can enter the lens. A larger aperture creates a shallower depth of field, helpful for keeping subjects in focus and blurring background details.

The distance from the screen that the projector can be placed to project images. Standard throw projectors typically need to be at least 6 feet away while short throw and ultra short throw projectors can be placed closer to the screen for use in smaller rooms.

There are a few HDR formats that tell the TV or other HDR-compatible product how to best utilize its capabilities to display HDR content. HDR technology can support one or multiple formats, each with various benefits to picture quality.
The manner in which a device sends data to another device over a short distance without the use of wires or cables.
The measurement of the width of a screen compared to the height of a screen, expressed as a ratio.

Native resolution of a screen refers to its single, fixed resolution. Sometimes screens must scale an image up or down in order to fit the native resolution. This can cause a loss of resolution or detail.
The out of box depth of the item. Depth is measured as the distance from the front of the item to the back as it would be primarily used or placed.
The out of box height of the item. Height is measured as the vertical distance from the bottom of the item to the top as it would be primarily used or placed.

reviews.reviewBody: We recently purchased the Hisense CanvasTV as I had been wanting a TV that has art.  After some research, I discovered the Hisense version and was VERY impressed not only by the quality of the picture (TV and art) but by the depth of available FREE art that the Hisense TV offers.  It is STUNNING and I love being able to change images to match my mood;)  This TV is not only super impressive from a visual perspective but also from an affordability.  We are so pleased and I can't recommend this TV enough.

reviews.name: Excellent replacement for the Samsung Frame
reviews.reviewBody: This is an excellent TV. I own the 2020 Frame TV and was in the market for another Samsung Frame TV when I came across this. There was no hesitation; I ordered it two weeks before it was released. The matte anti-glare screen is excellent. The color reproduction is also excellent. Art mode is gorgeous and really fools you. My only suggestion for improvement in future updates will be the mat borders being even for wide-dimension pictures; it appears the left and right sides of the mat are thicker. Also, for cable management purposes, it would be a good idea to have the power cable on the same side as HDMI, so all can go into the wall cable management conduit. This is a great deal compared to the Samsung Frame TV. Keep doing a good job, Hisense.

primaryImage.altText: Hisense CanvasTV Google TV

videos.title: Hisense - Class S7 Series CanvasTV Video

descriptions.long: Put your personal style on display! Transform your living room into an art gallery with the CanvasTV from Hisense. Showcase works of art when your TV isn’t in use—you can either choose from our collection of iconic masterpieces or upload your own. See the perfect picture, no matter the ambient lighting, with no glare, thanks to the Hi-Matte Display. Hang your TV flat against the wall like a painting, in part to our UltraSlim Wall Mount. Experience the magic of a screen that senses your presence and saves you energy by only powering on when you’re nearby.

specifications.definition: Part of a group of the same product type with similar features.
The device is capable of connecting to another device in order to send or receive streaming content. Share content from your mobile device to your TV or vice versa.
Predicted cost of operating the product under average conditions for one year.
Smart, or smart-capable devices are able to connect directly to your home network in order to stream content from the Internet, run Internet-based apps, or connect to other smart devices.
Proprietary technologies produced in addition to the Refresh Rate that smooth out faster moving pictures to reduce blur and pixelation.
The group size measurement of a screen. This differs from a screen size measured diagonally from corner to corner.
Indicates the appropriate environment product was designed to be used in.
The text version of spoken audio displayed on the screen. Devices that can display closed captioning typically have the option to toggle the feature on or off.
This input is used to connect devices such as antennas or cable boxes to a TV via a coaxial cable.
Compatible with or able to be connected to other smart devices or applications.
The total number of USB ports including all generations and versions.
A digital assistant built into the device that uses voice commands to answer questions and control smart devices.
An HDR-compatible 4K TV or other HDR-compatible product displays HDR video content when it's available from sources like 4K Ultra HD Blu-ray Discs and 4K streaming services.

Edge-lit: lights are on the edges of the display with ~10 zones of vertical LEDs. Direct-lit: lights are on the edges and behind the screen for more light uniformity than Edge-lit. Full array: direct-lit with local dimming for greater contrast with up to 100 zones of LEDs.
The available language options for displayed text or captions.

The ATSC TV Tuner is a component built into conventional TV sets or other devices for receiving over-the-air broadcast TV without a cable/satellite box. Digital tuners may be purchased separately and connected to a device if it does not have one built in.
Predicted amount of electricity needed to operate the product under average conditions for one year.
The number and type of connectors used to connect to an external display.
Generally, these technologies allow syncing between a computer/console game's frame rate and the device's refresh rate for a smoother display without tearing.

The Electronic Product Environmental Assessment Tool (EPEAT) was designed to provide an environmental assessment tool for purchasers. In order to qualify for EPEAT, a product must meet all 23 required criteria.
VESA wall mount standards refer to the spacing of screw holes built into a TV in order to fit with standard TV wall mounts. These standards are implemented into most TVs and monitors.
Casts the screen of one device onto another wirelessly, using a common protocol (typically Bluetooth).

Just like a computer, a smart TV needs an operating system (also called a smart platform) in order to access the Internet, connect with entertainment apps, and play streaming content. Some common TV smart platforms are; Roku TV, Android TV, and Chromecast.
Whether the stand can adjust to have more than one measurement either between the legs or the base itself.
Streaming services and other programs are available on this device. Keep in mind, there may be more services supported than just those shown here.
Size of the screen, measured diagonally from corner to corner.
The number of frames per second the device can produce natively without enhancement. Higher rates help produce smooth, seamless pictures.
The Bluetooth specification formalized by the Bluetooth Special Interest Group. All versions of the Bluetooth standard are backwards compatible with previous versions.

features.title: Art Mode
features.description: Show off your taste when you’re not watching your TV. Select a single picture or create a slideshow of paintings that match your mood. You can even share all your favorite photos on the big screen by connecting a USB or use the Art Mode app to upload your photos

features.title: Choose Your Frame
features.description: Switch in (and out) the CanvasTV’s magnetic frame whenever the mood strikes. Just snap it into place and voila! The CanvasTV comes with the teak frame, but you can also opt for additional colors, (sold separately).

features.title: Hi-Matte Display
features.description: Admire your favorite works of art without the glare. A special, low reflection coating enhances your masterpiece-viewing experience by giving the digital artwork the depth and texture of real paintings.

features.title: UltraSlim Wall Mount
features.description: Hang your CanvasTV flush against the wall to save space and blend in with your decor. Our innovative, two-part mounting system makes the screen light enough that it’s easy to handle and install with the help of another person.

features.title: Multi-Channel Surround Sound
features.description: Get in on the action, whether you’re watching movies, playing games, or listening to music. 2.0.2 surround sound fills up your room and transports you into the scene.

features.title: 4K QLED
features.description: Soak up a world of rich color and detail. 4K QLED with Quantum Dot technology relies on how light is emitted to create purer, more brilliant hues than a regular LED TV. With over a billion color combinations, QLED smart displays are in a class of their own

features.title: Game Mode PRO
features.description: Game Mode PRO is designed with the technology you need to get on the leaderboard. With a Variable Refresh Rate, you can beat any opponent that comes your way. AMD FreeSync Premium, Auto Low Latency Mode (ALLM) and Low Latency MEMC virtually eliminate screen tearing and controller input lag in your play. And the New Game Bar lets you customize and adjust your gameplay right from your TV with your remote

features.title: 2 Year Warranty
features.description: Enjoy peace of mind thanks to Hisense’s 2-year warranty on this TV. That's double the industry standard!

reviews.name: Sony 65" Bravia 8 OLED UHD Smart Google TV 2024
reviews.reviewBody:
I purchased a Sony 65" Bravia 8 OLED UHD Smart Google TV (2024) in July 2024 after reading extensive reviews of other manufacturers reviews and speaking with Best Buy customer service in store. I purchased this TV soon after it first became available. I owned Samsung and Sony TVs prior to this purchase. I still own a Samsung and Sony TV. Both have provided reliable service for years. I settled with this TV after seeing it on display and comparing with other TVs displayed at Best Buy. I compared Sony with similar Samsung and LG TVs. The reviews and comparisons I read provided customer issues with the reliability of current similar Samsung TVs. Reliability was also brought up by the Best Buy representatives during three visits to the store. I do use the sound from the TV as the AVR to provide sound. 
Pros: 1. Clarity in viewing with vivid colors. 2. Great viewing at night with no other lights on. 3. Black and dark colors are impressive. 4. Ease of use of remote and programming. 
Cons: 1. Not good in a highly lighted space due to screen reflection of room lighting.
2. Pricy

reviews.name: Best TV EVER!!!!!
reviews.reviewBody: I was able to talk my wife into letting me get this one as our old tv was on the way out. Despite my old tv only being a 5yr old 4k LED, I didn't think the picture quailty could be approved upon. I was wrong! This Sony looks beautiful in our living room. The OLED gives it the best contrast and richest colors I have ever seen. Everything we have watched so far has been an eye joygasm. I have an XBOX series X and this TV made it seem like I had a next gen console. If you're looking for the best, this is it!

reviews.name: Amazing picture quality!
reviews.reviewBody: Amazing! I'm blown away at the screen quality. This is my second Sony and first 65 inch and OLED! Never going back. Holy moly this makes watching tv series and movies fun. I have it connected to my Sonos so can't speak of the speaker quality on the tv. My previous Sony tv speakers were lacking hence the Sonos. TV remote is a little smaller than previous but everything still feels natural as does the home screen. I did the $199 delivery and thought my guys were great but felt this is overpriced after the service was complete. $99 makes more sense.

descriptions.long: The perfect centerpiece for your living space with slim styling and cinematic picture and sound to match. Pure OLED black and vibrant color brings out astonishing texture and realism in everything you watch. The screen is the speaker delivering a totally unique and immersive theater-like sound that keeps you on the edge of your seat.

features.title: Pure black OLED contrast
features.description: Over 8 million self-lit pixels are precisely controlled to produce pure black with high brightness.

features.title: Billions of real-world colors
features.description: Access billions of accurate real-world colors XR Triluminos Pro.

features.title: Powerful TV processing
features.description: XR Processor intelligently enhances every scene in real-time boosting color, contrast, and clarity.

features.title: Everything you stream. All on one screen
features.description: Get access to all your favorite streaming apps in one place with Google TV. And with Google Assistant, simply use your voice to search and ask questions.

features.title: Your favorite streaming apps in one place
features.description: Get access to all your favorite streaming apps, including Netflix, Prime Video, Disney+, YouTube, the Apple TV app, Crunchyroll, and many more.

features.title: Effortlessly stream to your TV
features.description: Easily stream to your TV with support for AirPlay 2 and Chromecast built-in.

features.title: Movies included with BRAVIA TV
features.description: Enjoy streaming high-bitrate, high-quality 4K UHD movies included with the SONY PICTURES CORE app (formerly BRAVIA CORE). Get 5 credits to redeem on latest release movies and 12 months subscription on hundreds of classics.

features.title: Studio calibrated picture
features.description: Get picture quality just as the creator’s intended with studio calibrated picture modes specially designed for Netflix, Prime Video, and SONY PICTURES CORE (formerly BRAVIA CORE).

features.title: More immersive movie experience
features.description: Get a truly cinematic viewing experience with support for Dolby Vision and Atmos, IMAX Enhanced, and DTS:X.

features.title: Crystal clear picture
features.description: Upscale all your HD and digital content and bring back lost detail with XR Clear Image.

features.title: Blur-free action
features.description: See blur-free picture quality in fast-moving sports and action-packed movies powered by XR OLED Motion .

features.title: Cinematic sound
features.description: With Acoustic Surface Audio+, hear true immersive audio from the entire screen, perfectly matching sound to the action.

features.title: Loud and clear dialog
features.description: Clearly hear dialog, even in loud action scenes, with Voice Zoom 3.

features.title: BRAVIA TV and BRAVIA Theater, the perfect pair
features.description: Hear elevated audio and clearer dialog with Acoustic Center Sync when paired with compatible BRAVIA Theater models.

features.title: Do it all with BRAVIA Connect app
features.description: Use BRAVIA Connect app to easily control your BRAVIA TV from your smartphone and change volume, picture settings, and even troubleshoot issues.

features.title: Perfect for PlayStation 5
features.description: Take your PS5 gaming to the next level with exclusive features – Auto HDR Tone Mapping and Auto Genre Picture Mode – that optimizes picture quality for gaming and streaming.

features.title: All your game settings in one place
features.description: Game Menu puts all your gaming picture settings and exclusive assist features in one place.

features.title: HDMI 2.1 features
features.description: Get the advantage in high-performance gaming with HDMI 2.1 features 4K/120, VRR, ALLM and the newly added Source-based Tone Mapping (SBTM).

features.title: Beautifully designed
features.description: Premium four-way stand – two low-profile positions for wide or narrow furniture, or two raised positions to accommodate a soundbar.

features.title: Compatible with BRAVIA Cam
features.description: BRAVIA CAM (sold separately) automatically optimizes picture and sound according to your room environment, and you can enjoy video chat on a bigger screen.

features.title: All your Eco settings in one place
features.description: Eco Dashboard keeps all your energy efficiency settings in one place, making it easier to change them individually or in one go, now with more details to make more informed, eco-conscious decisions.

features.title: QLED Quantum Dot Color
features.description: Experience color like you’ve never seen it before. QLED Quantum Dot Technology, significantly broadens the range of color you perceive to create over a billion individual shades. So, you can soak up every wave of the Caribbean Sea and every brushstroke of the desert sunset

features.title: 144Hz Game Mode Pro
features.description: Level up your gaming. The 144Hz Game Mode Pro is designed with the technology you need to get on the leaderboard. With a Variable Refresh Rate of 48Hz to 144Hz, your console and PC gaming can beat any opponent that comes your way. AMD FreeSync™ Premium Pro, Auto Low Latency Mode and Low Latency MEMC, virtually eliminate annoyances like screen tearing and controller input lag in your play.

features.title: Dolby Vision · Atmos
features.description: Get transported through the screen. Dolby Vision captures even the most subtle emotions flickering across the actor’s face during a dark night scene. And the multidimensional sound of Dolby Atmos puts you smack-dab in the action, whether it’s in a jungle, city or rocket ship.

features.title: 4K AI Upscaler
features.description: Bring what’s on screen into crystal-clear focus. Our 4k AI Upscaler transforms beloved classics, home movies, broadcast TV and even streaming content into striking 4K quality. It’s amazing what can happen when every pixel works even harder.

features.title: Voice Remote
features.description: Talk back to your TV. Voice Control puts you in charge of your own viewing experience. Switch shows, adjust the volume or explore new content, all at the sound of your own voice.

features.title: Google TV
features.description: The entertainment you love. With a little help from Google. Google TV brings together movies, shows, live TV and more from across apps and subscriptions and organizes them just for the user. And helps the user discover new things to watch with recommendations based on their interests

reviews.name: Just set-up and watch
reviews.reviewBody: Easy setup from the box. I was trying to decide between the Frame from Samsung or the NXTFRAME TV from TCL. I went with TCL because it fit my budget better and after reading many reviews, I didn't want to deal with software issues.  This TV works great for my needs. The colors are pretty good and it's easy to adjust the settings. I love the slim profile and overall look.

reviews.name: Great tv
reviews.reviewBody: Awesome tv! Was thinking about buying the Samsung frame tv but ended up with this in the 55 inch. Great quality, fast, thin, and looks great. Definitely buy.

primaryImage.altText: TCL NXTFRAME

descriptions.long: TCL NXTFRAME TVs combine an array of art options with premium picture technologies to create a stunning image. TCL’s Art Library and AI art transform your living room into your personal studio. The included Flush Wall Mount and additional light wood bezel allows the NXTFRAME TV to blend seamlessly into any home décor. QLED PRO Quantum Dot technology and HDR ULTRA with Dolby Vision IQ provide enhanced contrast, accurate colors and fine details. The powerful TCL AIPQ PRO Processor intelligently optimizes the color, contrast, and clarity for an unrivaled 4K HDR experience. The High Brightness+ LED Backlight produces brighter images for an enhanced viewing experience for all your favorite movies and TV shows. Game Accelerator 240 together with Auto Game Mode provides the lowest latency for a more responsive gameplay without lag, designed to keep you at the top of any leaderboard. Including Dolby Atmos and DTS Virtual:X,  the NXTFRAME TV provides a complete audio package. The NXTFRAME TV offers advanced picture quality with a beautiful lifestyle design worthy of any home.

features.title: World’s Thinnest “All-In-One” NXTFRAME TV
features.description: Ultra-Slim Design is just 1.1” deep, and the built-in chassis allows for simple installation without the need for an external chassis box.

features.title: Off-White Bezel and Included Light Wood Frame
features.description: The NXTFRAME TV has an off-white  bezel that blends into virtually any home décor and includes a light wood color magnetic frame in the carton box, so you can quickly and easily change the look!

features.title: Flush Wall Mount Included
features.description: Specially designed ultra-thin wall mount holds the NXTFRAME TV tight to the wall for an elegant look.

features.title: Movable Floor Stand
features.description: Available easel-style design with detachable wheels, cable management, storage shelf, and magnetic decorative cover. Stand sold separately.

features.title: Table Stands
features.description: Available height adjustable table stands with magnetic decorative cover making for a tidy appearance atop a credenza or console. Stand sold separately.

features.title: Ultra Matte Anti-Glare Screen
features.description: Features a highly Matte anti-reflective screen for a true wall art look.

features.title: Art Library and AI Art
features.description: Comes with a curated Art Library, AI Art capability, multiple matte options, and a personal photo gallery mode.

features.title: TCL AIPQ PRO Processor
features.description: TCL’s powerful processor intelligently optimizes color, contrast, clarity, and motion to create images that are a work of Art.

features.title: 4K Ultra HD Resolution
features.description: Experience incredible detail with 4X the resolution of 1080p Full HDTVs.

features.title: QLED PRO – Quantum Dot Technology
features.description: Rich, vibrant, and amazingly accurate colors bring images to life.

features.title: High Brightness+ LED Backlight
features.description: Brighter images enhance viewing in any room light.

features.title: 120Hz Panel Refresh Rate (144 Hz Variable Refresh Rate)
features.description: Clear fast motion for viewing action movies or sports, and quick action gaming.

features.title: HDR ULTRA with Dolby Vision IQ, HDR10+, HDR10, & HLG
features.description: Enjoy enhanced contrast, accurate colors and fine details utilizing all the most advanced HDR formats.

features.title: Motion Rate 480 with MEMC
features.description: Combines multiple motion enhancement technologies for best-in-class motion clarity.

features.title: Game Accelerator 240
features.description: With up to blistering fast 240 VRR, enjoy more responsive gameplay without lag, designed to keep you at the top of any leaderboard.

features.title: Auto Game Mode (ALLM) with AMD FreeSync Premium
features.description: Automatically enables game mode for the lowest possible input lag and latency, ensuring an optimal gaming experience.

features.title: Dolby Atmos Audio
features.description: Advanced spatial audio processing for movies, TV shows, and video games.

features.title: Enhanced Dialogue Mode
features.description: Hear voices more clearly when watching movies or TV shows, or while playing video games.

features.title: DTS:X Audio
features.description: Immersive, life-like surround sound in movies and TV shows.

features.title: DTS Virtual:X
features.description: Advanced audio post-processing for immersive 3D sound, from just your TV speakers.

features.title: Bluetooth Personal Audio
features.description: Pair your favorite Bluetooth headphones to the TV for a private listening experience.

features.title: 4 HDMI Inputs including one with eARC
features.description: Four high-speed HDMI inputs for the best connection to gaming consoles, set-top boxes, AV receiver, and more.

features.title: Wi-Fi 5
features.description: Fast Wi-Fi performance for your high-speed internet connection

features.title: Google TV Smart OS with Hands-Free Voice Control and Voice Remote
features.description: The entertainment you love, quickly and easily. Google TV brings your favorite movies, TV shows, and live events together in one place.

features.title: Google Chromecast Built-in
features.description: Works with the streaming apps you know and love: Enjoy TV shows, movies, videos, songs, games, sports and more from thousands of apps.

name: Samsung - 55” Class DU7200 Series Crystal UHD 4K Smart Tizen TV (2024)
description: Shop Samsung 55” Class DU7200 Series Crystal UHD 4K Smart Tizen TV (2024) at Best Buy. Find low everyday prices and buy online for delivery or in-store pick-up. Price Match Guarantee.

reviews.name: Samsung,  you made me a believer!
reviews.reviewBody:
Bought my tv set in july 2024. Been a fan of Samsung tvs since the plasmas were being sold. And though i enjoyed shaprp tvs or sony tvs, i did have a budget. Tvs are just that, a piece of electronics that sits there until you turn it on. 
I did try a few inexpensive models , such as roku tvs, yet they weren't the same. Finally my tv broke and i found this beauty. A 55 in, Samsung hd tv. Now, i dont spend 1000 on tv, thats just not me anymore.  However,  those 1000$ tvs look nice and super realistic.  
At the moment I turned this tv on i could see the difference.  Color is sharp,  picture is pristine,  sound is my much better,  and over speed and functionality has been great. I chipped in extra for the protection.  Total, just under 5 bills.  The only, and i mean the only complaint i may have is tizen, the ui interface,  or i should say the opening software screen.  Takes a bit to learn, and somewhat non intuitive.  Beyond that, i have been enjoying my tv wvery night. The movies the shows that i used to watch in the past have been revived! They look so crisp! So hd! I love my new experience! And it doesn't have to cost an arm and leg lol.

reviews.name: My TV
reviews.reviewBody: I'm enjoying my birthday/ anniversary gift. My tv is more than I expected. Setting up was super easy, color, sounds, channels are exactly what I was looking for. I love the adjustable stand. I was challenged using the remote, nevertheless following instructions in no time I got that under control. I'm SUPER SATISFIED with my purchase.

reviews.name: You Will Be Amazed!
reviews.reviewBody: I'll choose Samsung every single time! The definition, color spectrum, and sound are all excellent! When I moved in my home 15 years ago, I had Samsung televisions. The televisions are still working perfectly. I only upgraded because I desired to have a smart TV. You will never go wrong with Samsung.

reviews.name: Great tv
reviews.reviewBody: Love the size of the tv even tho bigger then what im normally used to but great picture and sound i bought a tv stand because the legs it came with was to wide but overall great tv for a decent price i had 2 Samsung crystal clear tvs when it comes to picture this tv wins but refresh wait and gaming its lacks compared to samsung still and all great purchase i always by my tv from best buy

reviews.name: A premium TV in budget
reviews.reviewBody: This is literally at par with costly Samsung, LG or Sony TV. From sound to 4k picture quality, everything is top notch. It was in some deal, so I got it for even little less than usual. Totally worth it.

reviews.name: For it’s price range it’s worth it.
reviews.reviewBody:
I’ve been using this TV for a about 2 months now since purchased when it was on sale. 
Pros
It has a good color range, 4k, hdr considering for it’s price tag.
It’s user interface is much smoother than previous models (i used to have 2020 model and it was slow as F).
It has android based system which means you can install 3rd party player apps easily. And it supports wide range of apps.
Amazon voice control comes in handy when you are trying to type something to search.


Cons

The sound is kind of mediocre but hey it’s a budget tv
For some reason images used to get some wavy thing when i was watching a movie. At first i thought it’s just movie but more movies i more i notice this wave ghosting thing on screen and i googled and it turns out some image filtering configuration. Which was annoying.
It’s amazon tv so if you don’t have an amazon account which is kind of rare. You have to open a new account. And of course if you have amazon prime you can set it up easy and smooth.

Insignia™ - 58" Class F30 Series LED 4K UHD Smart Fire TV Features

descriptions.long: Take in every moment with breathtaking 4K Ultra HD on this 58-inch screen. It’s equipped with DTS Studio Sound to create realistic and immersive audio. Access live over-the-air channels and streaming—and control it all with your voice. Ask Alexa to launch apps, search for titles and more. Experience the affordable, yet high-performing Insignia NS-58F301NA25 58" Class F30 Series LED 4K UHD Smart Fire TV.

specifications.definition: Devices carrying the ENERGY STAR service mark, such as computer products and peripherals, kitchen appliances, and other products, generally use 20% to 30% less energy than required by federal standards.

There are a few HDR formats that tell the TV or other HDR-compatible product how to best utilize its capabilities to display HDR content. HDR technology can support one or multiple formats, each with various benefits to picture quality.
The number and type of USB ports the product has.

Surround sound systems use multiple audio channels and speakers to create an immersive sound experience for the listener. There are also various proprietary technologies that imitate this kind of sound via a device's built-in speakers or soundbar.
The manner in which a device sends data to another device over a short distance without the use of wires or cables.

Backward, downward, and front-firing speakers direct sound into the room from those respective directions. A soundbar is typically long and rectangular, and designed to act as an all-in-one speaker with greater sound production than that of a TV alone. An acoustic surface is the result of small sound actuators embedded directly behind the screen, turning the entire screen's surface into a speaker.
Refers to the number of pixels, both horizontally and vertically, used to capture video/images. The higher the resolution the finer the detail that can be seen.
The out of box width of the item. Width is measured as the horizontal distance from one side of the item to the other as it would be primarily used or placed.
Feature that blocks television programming if it has a content rating outside of the acceptable rating(s) configured by the user.
The horizontal measurement of the stand/base, or the distance from the outside of one leg to the outside of the opposite leg, as it is attached to the product.

specifications.definition: Part of a group of the same product type with similar features.
The device features an interface that allows for the connection of headphones.
The device is capable of connecting to another device in order to send or receive streaming content. Share content from your mobile device to your TV or vice versa.
Predicted cost of operating the product under average conditions for one year.
Smart, or smart-capable devices are able to connect directly to your home network in order to stream content from the Internet, run Internet-based apps, or connect to other smart devices.
Proprietary technologies produced in addition to the Refresh Rate that smooth out faster moving pictures to reduce blur and pixelation.
The group size measurement of a screen. This differs from a screen size measured diagonally from corner to corner.
Indicates the appropriate environment product was designed to be used in.
Amount of power needed to support an electrical current.
The text version of spoken audio displayed on the screen. Devices that can display closed captioning typically have the option to toggle the feature on or off.

The wireless networking standard used by the device. Each iteration of the standard developed by the Wi-Fi Alliance corresponds to an existing IEEE 802.11 protocol; for example, standard 802.11ac (or AC) is termed Wi-Fi 5. Refers specifically to the standard the device is designed to use, but ultimately determines product interoperability and backward compatibility including previous versions.
This input is used to connect devices such as antennas or cable boxes to a TV via a coaxial cable.
Compatible with or able to be connected to other smart devices or applications.
A system that converts language text into speech.
The total number of USB ports including all generations and versions.
A digital assistant built into the device that uses voice commands to answer questions and control smart devices.
The battery size required for operation.
An HDR-compatible 4K TV or other HDR-compatible product displays HDR video content when it's available from sources like 4K Ultra HD Blu-ray Discs and 4K streaming services.

Edge-lit: lights are on the edges of the display with ~10 zones of vertical LEDs. Direct-lit: lights are on the edges and behind the screen for more light uniformity than Edge-lit. Full array: direct-lit with local dimming for greater contrast with up to 100 zones of LEDs.
The available language options for displayed text or captions.

The ATSC TV Tuner is a component built into conventional TV sets or other devices for receiving over-the-air broadcast TV without a cable/satellite box. Digital tuners may be purchased separately and connected to a device if it does not have one built in.
Predicted amount of electricity needed to operate the product under average conditions for one year.
The number and type of connectors used to connect to an external display.
Generally, these technologies allow syncing between a computer/console game's frame rate and the device's refresh rate for a smoother display without tearing.

The Electronic Product Environmental Assessment Tool (EPEAT) was designed to provide an environmental assessment tool for purchasers. In order to qualify for EPEAT, a product must meet all 23 required criteria.
VESA wall mount standards refer to the spacing of screw holes built into a TV in order to fit with standard TV wall mounts. These standards are implemented into most TVs and monitors.
Casts the screen of one device onto another wirelessly, using a common protocol (typically Bluetooth).

Indicates whether the device features descriptive video service (DVS). This service provides narration of key elements in the program, such as actions, costumes, and scene changes, to help engage visually-impaired audiences.

Just like a computer, a smart TV needs an operating system (also called a smart platform) in order to access the Internet, connect with entertainment apps, and play streaming content. Some common TV smart platforms are; Roku TV, Android TV, and Chromecast.
Whether the stand can adjust to have more than one measurement either between the legs or the base itself.
Streaming services and other programs are available on this device. Keep in mind, there may be more services supported than just those shown here.
Size of the screen, measured diagonally from corner to corner.
The number of frames per second the device can produce natively without enhancement. Higher rates help produce smooth, seamless pictures.
The Bluetooth specification formalized by the Bluetooth Special Interest Group. All versions of the Bluetooth standard are backwards compatible with previous versions.

features.title: 4K Ultra HD (2160p resolution)
features.description: Enjoy breathtaking HDR10 4K movies and TV shows at 4 times the resolution of Full HD, and upscale your current content to Ultra HD-level picture quality.

features.title: High Dynamic Range
features.description: Provides a wide range of color details and sharper contrast, from the brightest whites to the deepest blacks.

features.title: Alexa voice control
features.description: The Alexa Voice Remote lets you easily control your entertainment, search across apps, switch inputs, and more using just your voice. Press and hold the voice button and ask Alexa to easily find, launch, and control content, and even switch to cable.

features.title: Access thousands of shows with Fire TV
features.description: Watch over 1 million streaming movies and TV episodes with access to thousands of channels, apps and Alexa skills, including Prime Video, Netflix, Hulu, HBO Max, YouTube, Apple TV+, Disney+, ESPN+, Sling TV, Paramount+, and other services right from this TV.*

features.title: DTS Studio Sound
features.description: This premium audio enhancement suite creates realistic and immersive audio with two-speaker playback that expands your sense of space and ambience.

features.title: Supports HDMI ARC and HDMI eARC
features.description: Sends audio directly from the HDMI jack to a compatible soundbar or AV receiver, removing the need for an extra cable.

features.title: Versatile connections
features.description: Connect your home theater components such as a Blu-ray player, game console, speakers, cable/antenna and more. TV connections include 3 HDMI ports, composite (AV) jacks, digital optical output, USB port, headphone jack, coaxial jack, ethernet port and Wi-Fi technology.

features.title: LED-backlit LCD screen
features.description: With reliable and long-lasting LED lighting, this LCD screen delivers a wide range of colors and contrast for a memorable viewing experience.

features.title: Parental controls
features.description: Manage your children’s viewing by blocking content based on program ratings or entire channels. Once the kids are in bed, access whatever you want with a simple PIN.

features.title: Wall mountable
features.description: Compatible with VESA pattern 300 × 200 for simple and safe wall mounting.

features.title: Supports Apple AirPlay
features.description: Share videos, photos, music and more from an Apple device to your TV with the touch of a button.

features.title: Sustainably Focused
features.description: The outer package for this product has been manufactured with sustainably sourced paper, certified by the Forest Stewardship Council (FSC®). FSC certification ensures that packaging comes from responsibly managed forests to help protect the planet - today and tomorrow.
*Web-based services and content require high-speed Internet service. Some services may require a subscription.

reviews.name: Budget-Friendly 4K Crispy Magic
reviews.reviewBody:
I recently got the Insignia 55" F30 4K Fire TV, and I'm pretty impressed for the price. The picture quality is great - everything looks super crisp in 4K. Those bezels, wafer thin. The built-in Fire TV is super convenient, with all my streaming apps right there. The Alexa voice remote is a cool touch too. Sound's okay, nothing special, but it does the job for everyday watching.
Overall, this TV is a solid deal if you want a good-sized 4K screen without breaking the bank. It might not be the fanciest out there, but for streaming and casual use, it's more than enough. The price-to-performance ratio is spot on. I'd give it 4 out of 5 stars - not perfect, but definitely worth it for the money. If you're not too picky and want a good TV for less, this Insignia is a great choice.

reviews.name: Dream Come True !!!
reviews.reviewBody: This is the most outstanding tv purchase I’ve ever made . The price , picture, sound , quality and weight of the flat screen is immaculate glad I stopped  to make the purchase. Also the customer service I received was outstanding answering all questions with no issues . Great job will definitely return

reviews.name: **Amazing TV and Exceptional Service from Best Buy
reviews.reviewBody:
I recently purchased the Insignia 55-inch TV from Best Buy, and I couldn't be happier with my decision. This TV is simply the best!

The picture quality is outstanding, offering crisp and vibrant colors that make every viewing experience enjoyable. Whether I'm watching movies, sports, or playing video games, the visuals are consistently impressive. The 4K resolution truly brings out the finest details, making everything look more lifelike.

The sound quality is also surprisingly good for a TV in this price range. The built-in speakers deliver clear and balanced audio, which enhances the overall experience. However, it also pairs effortlessly with my soundbar, taking the audio to another level.

Setting up the TV was a breeze. The user interface is intuitive, and navigating through the menus is straightforward. I especially appreciate the smart TV features, which allow easy access to all my favorite streaming services. The remote is user-friendly and responsive, making it simple to switch between different apps and inputs.

One of the best aspects of this purchase was the excellent customer service at Best Buy. The staff was knowledgeable and helped me choose the perfect TV for my needs. The delivery was prompt, and the TV arrived in perfect condition.

Overall, the Insignia 55-inch TV is a fantastic value for its price. It combines great picture and sound quality with user-friendly smart features, making it a top-notch choice for anyone in the market for a new television. I highly recommend it!

features.description: Watch over 500,000 streaming movies and TV episodes with access to thousands of channels, apps and Alexa skills, including Apple TV+, Disney+, Hulu, Netflix, Prime Video, Sling TV, YouTube and other services right from this TV.*

features.title: DTS Studio Sound
features.description: This premium audio enhancement suite creates realistic and immersive audio with two-speaker playback that expands your sense of space and ambience.

features.title: Supports HDMI ARC and HDMI eARC
features.description: Sends audio directly from the HDMI jack to a compatible soundbar or AV receiver, removing the need for an extra cable.

features.title: Versatile connections
features.description: Connect your home theater components such as a Blu-ray player, game console, speakers, cable/antenna and more. TV connections include 3 HDMI ports, composite (AV) jacks, digital optical output, USB port, headphone jack, coaxial jack, ethernet port and Wi-Fi technology.

features.title: LED-backlit LCD screen
features.description: With reliable and long-lasting LED lighting, this LCD screen delivers a wide range of colors and contrast for a memorable viewing experience.

features.title: Parental controls
features.description: Manage your children’s viewing by blocking content based on program ratings or entire channels. Once the kids are in bed, access whatever you want with a simple PIN.

features.title: Wall mountable
features.description: Compatible with VESA pattern 400 × 300 for simple and safe wall mounting.

features.title: Supports Apple AirPlay
features.description: Share videos, photos, music and more from an Apple device to your TV with the touch of a button.

features.title: Sustainably Focused
features.description: The outer package for this product has been manufactured with sustainably sourced paper, certified by the Forest Stewardship Council (FSC®). FSC certification ensures that packaging comes from responsibly managed forests to help protect the planet—today and tomorrow.

specifications.definition: Devices carrying the ENERGY STAR service mark, such as computer products and peripherals, kitchen appliances, and other products, generally use 20% to 30% less energy than required by federal standards.

There are a few HDR formats that tell the TV or other HDR-compatible product how to best utilize its capabilities to display HDR content. HDR technology can support one or multiple formats, each with various benefits to picture quality.

Surround sound systems use multiple audio channels and speakers to create an immersive sound experience for the listener. There are also various proprietary technologies that imitate this kind of sound via a device's built-in speakers or soundbar.
The manner in which a device sends data to another device over a short distance without the use of wires or cables.

Backward, downward, and front-firing speakers direct sound into the room from those respective directions. A soundbar is typically long and rectangular, and designed to act as an all-in-one speaker with greater sound production than that of a TV alone. An acoustic surface is the result of small sound actuators embedded directly behind the screen, turning the entire screen's surface into a speaker.
Refers to the number of pixels, both horizontally and vertically, used to capture video/images. The higher the resolution the finer the detail that can be seen.
The out of box width of the item. Width is measured as the horizontal distance from one side of the item to the other as it would be primarily used or placed.
Feature that blocks television programming if it has a content rating outside of the acceptable rating(s) configured by the user.
The horizontal measurement of the stand/base, or the distance from the outside of one leg to the outside of the opposite leg, as it is attached to the product.
