features.title: Intelligent and powerful TV processing
features.description: See how real your entertainment can be, with immersive depth and lifelike picture quality, powered by Sony’s intelligent Cognitive Processor XR. Hundreds of thousands of individual on-screen elements are processed and remastered in the blink of an eye.

features.title: Enhanced contrast and impressive brightness
features.description: Experience real-life depth and detail with the deep black and impressive brightness. By controlling brightness in sections of the screen independently, Full Array LED backlighting balances light output to ensure scenes are full of breathtaking contrast.

features.title: Billions of real-world colors
features.description: Access billions of accurate colors and reproduce each shade with the subtle differences seen in the real world. XR Triluminos Pro enhances the range of hues and saturation, revealing extremely precise details within textures, and skin tones that look completely natural.

features.title: The entertainment you love. With help from Google.
features.description: With 700,000+ movies and TV episodes, live TV and more available across 10,000+ apps, Google TV takes streaming and live TV to the next level – bringing together your favorite entertainment from across your apps and organizing it all, just for you.

features.title: Movies on us with BRAVIA CORE
features.description: With the BRAVIA CORE app, enjoy the latest Sony Pictures Entertainment titles and the largest IMAX Enhanced collection. Simply redeem the included credits to choose from hundreds of the latest releases.

features.title: All your game settings in one place
features.description: With Game Menu, quickly manage your gaming picture settings and exclusive assist features in a single convenient interface. Get access to features like Black Equalizer, apply a Crosshair overlay, and use the Screen Size feature to shrink your screen.

features.title: Level up your gaming with HDMI 2.1 features
features.description: Sony TVs deliver a thrilling gaming experience with support for 4K/120, VRR, and ALLM as specified in HDMI 2.1. With 4K/120 you get up to 120fps in 4K resolution on compatible games.

features.title: Perfect for PlayStation 5
features.description: Get detailed, responsive game play and feel the action all around you with Sony TV exclusive feature for the PlayStation 5 console. Auto HDR Tone Mapping automatically adjusts the HDR settings of the PS5 console to the TV for detailed, high-contrast scenes.

features.title: Cinematic content as the creator intended
features.description: Get extraordinary picture quality and enjoy your favorite content the way it was designed to be seen. Dolby Vision makes scenes come to life with striking highlights, deeper blacks, and vibrant colors.

features.title: Sound and picture in perfect harmony
features.description: Hear an exceptional audio experience with more realistic sound and clear dialogue. With Acoustic Multi-Audio, sound positioning tweeters on the sides of the TV produce a wider, elevated soundstage, enabling audio to follow the action on screen.

features.title: Pairs perfectly with Sony soundbars
features.description: Paired with select Sony soundbars, our latest TVs go even further to bring you an unmatched audio-visual experience. Acoustic Center Sync synchronizes the TVs speakers with the soundbar, reinforcing the center speaker channel for clearer, fuller vocals.

features.title: Bring back lost texture and detail, the intelligent way
features.description: Bring back lost texture and detail, with reduced noise and blur, and see all your HD and digital content upscaled to near-4K resolution with XR Clear Image and XR 4K Upscaling.

features.title: Intelligent motion processing for fast-moving, blur-free scenes
features.description: XR Motion Clarity combats blur and judder by cross-analyzing key visual elements and precisely controlling the action in every scene to ensure picture quality stays smooth, bright, and clear.

features.title: Hands-free help from Google
features.description: With hands free voice control built into Sony TVs with Google TVs, you can set aside your remote and simply use your voice to search and access entertainment, get answers, control the TV and smart home devices and streamline your day. Just say “Hey Google” to get started.

features.title: All your favorite streaming apps in one place
features.description: Sony TVs with Google TV give you access to all your favorite streaming apps in one place, including Netflix, Prime Video, Disney+, YouTube, the Apple TV app, HBO Max, Peacock, and many more.

features.title: Family-friendly smart TV
features.description: Discover a fun collection of movies and shows for the whole family. Create a Kids Profile that can help you guide children to age-appropriate content. Set parental controls to restrict what streaming services are shown, limit watching time, and even set bedtimes.

features.title: Works with AirPlay
features.description: With Apple AirPlay support, you can share pictures, video, or audio to your television right from your iPhone, iPad, or Mac. Watch movies and shows from your favorite apps, the Apple TV app, or even from Safari.

features.title: Beautifully designed to complement your space
features.description: Our premium design keeps you focused on the big picture. The versatile two-way multi-position stand gives you the flexibility of a low-profile immersive setting that focuses your attention on the picture, or a raised setting ideal for your soundbar.

features.title: Discover new ways to enjoy TV with BRAVIA CAM
features.description: Connect BRAVIA CAM, sold separately, for an even more dynamic viewing experience. Ambient Optimization Pro recognizes where you’re sitting in the room and automatically optimizes the picture and sound for the environment.

features.title: All your energy-saving settings in one place
features.description: With the flexible and configurable Eco Dashboard, energy saving settings can now be centrally managed. You can easily customize energy saving settings for your TV usage, viewing environment, and the content you are watching, all in one place.

reviews.name: Outstanding Visual Experience and Smart Features
reviews.reviewBody: This Samsung 65” Class DU7200 Series Crystal UHD 4K Smart Tizen TV has exceeded all my expectations. The picture quality is stunning with vibrant colors and sharp details, thanks to its Crystal UHD resolution. The Tizen operating system is intuitive and offers a seamless experience with a wide range of apps. The smart features are impressive, making streaming a breeze. The slim design and sleek finish add a touch of elegance to my living room. Setup was quick and easy, and the remote control is user-friendly. Overall, this TV is a fantastic addition to my home entertainment system!

reviews.name: Best tv purchase I’ve ever made!
reviews.reviewBody: We bought this after our old tv got cracked in our move. Due to the excellent price we purchased it immediately and didn’t want to wait until Black Friday. I’m so glad we did! The picture is beautiful, vibrant, and boots up the second you hit the power button at full color and clarity. I never noticed much of a difference on tv picture and resolution but the picture on this is really beautiful and clear, pleasing to watch. The sound is also wonderful, we wound up moving our soundbar into the other room with the other tv because the sound quality on this is fantastic. If you’re hesitating, please don’t! Do yourself a favor.

reviews.name: EXCELLENT VALUE
reviews.reviewBody: Great picture for the price.    Clear colors and sharp.    Easily fit on my existing tv mount.   I replaced a 55inch Samsung TV with this 65inch model.   It is extremely light weight so I was actually able to install with no help.   I have a pretty long wingspan so that helps.   I highly recommend this TV.

description: Shop TCL 75" Class Q7 Q-Class QLED 4K HDR Smart TV with Google TV (2023) at Best Buy. Find low everyday prices and buy online for delivery or in-store pick-up. Price Match Guarantee.

reviews.name: so far - so good
reviews.reviewBody: 'got the 75". 'Was planning on getting a Sony TV, but after the price drop this was too good to pass up and it allowed me to get the 5 year warranty and still come in at a couple hundred under the comparable Sony model. I've had a few clients get high end name brand TV's (Sony, Samsung, LG - I'm looking at you), only to have them fail in a a year or two, so getting the extended warranty made sense to me. I do not regret the purchase decision. Setup with Google Home App was surprisingly straightforward. I quite like the picture it produces. The only thing that's odd is the limited adjustability of Dolby Vision content. Not sure if that's by design or unique to this brand/model. Either way, the picture (in Movie mode) is great out of the box, so there is little need to adjust it, once you dialed it in to your liking. I can't comment on sound, as I run the sound thru the eARC to a Marantz receiver, which works flawlessly. Can't comment on durability either, as I've only had it for a couple of months, but so far the TV and Google software have worked without a hitch. Two more things: 1) the TV does get pretty bright, if that's something you're after and 2) the Glass does not have anti-reflective coating. If you set it up in a room where reflections might be an issue you might want to spend a little more to get a TV that has better coating. Otherwise, this is solid, especially given the price.

reviews.name: QLED for a fair price
reviews.reviewBody: Best 75in TV for the money. Comparing with other brands; it deliveries great image and sound. Crispy, clear and beautiful colors. I got it when it was on sale for less than 1k!

reviews.name: The best value dollar to picture and feature ratio
reviews.reviewBody: The Good: I was truly impressed with the image quality in both SDR and HDR. This TV uses the same processor as the the TCL flagship QM8. For you non tuners it looked great out of the box, once I turned off the Low Power Mode that most all TV's today are shipped in. Setup was a breeze but it takes a good 10 minutes or so to download and install current software updates depending on your internet connectivity. The Google TV setup is breeze using your phone, tablet, laptop or PC. The Google interface locks in and switches your Apps fast and works like a charm. The TV has an excellent wide range of tuning features. Bright saturated colors, deep blacks with a minimal amount of blooming. Netflix HDR+ blew me away! The sound quality is decent but I had the TV routed through a high end Dolby Atmos 9.1 sound system. After doing a months worth of research watching the top experts on YouTube and reading countless reviews. I would say that this is the best value for dollar to picture and feature ratio on today's TV market. Easily as good if not better in some areas as Samsung, LG and Sony. The Bad: I lost the so called "Panel Lottery" as the TV developed a red line from the top to the bottom and a white, red and blue line from side to side across the screen in 4 days of minimal usage. Sadly I had to return it to Best Buy. I liked the TV enough to try it again and so I ordered another, hoping I win this round on the "Panel Lottery. Kudos to Best Buy and their customer service, always a pleasure to deal with when a product has an issue! I will update this review once I receive and test the replacement TV.

primaryImage.altText: TCL is a brand of televisions that are known for their quality and affordability. In the image, a football player is running with a football in his hand, and the TCL logo is displayed on the screen. The television is a QLED model, which is known for its excellent color reproduction and high contrast. This image showcases the capabilities of the TCL QLED television in displaying sports content, such as football games.

videos.title: Q Class Gaming TV overview video

descriptions.long: TCL Q7 Class Smart TVs offers the perfect TV for fast action movies, sports, and next level gaming with QLED Quantum Dot technology and HDR ULTRA with Dolby Vision IQ you can enjoy enhanced contrast and vivid colors. TCL’s High Brightness PRO Direct LED Backlight produces up to 1,000 nits peak brightness for dazzling specular highlights, perfect for any viewing environment. Full Array PRO local dimming with up to 200+ zones adapt to on-screen content for deep blacks without image blooming powered by TCL's AIPQ Engine Gen 3, an advanced processor optimizing each scene with machine learning for an unrivaled cinematic experience. 120Hz native panel refresh rate with Motion Rate 480 focuses on best-in-class motion clarity producing smooth video playback. With TCL's Game Accelerator 240 and Auto Game Mode gameplay is blistering fast keeping you ahead of the competition. TCL Q Class Smart TVs are True Premium TVs.

The number of discrete channels of sound output. This can be a single number or multiple numbers separated by decimal(s). The first number is the primary, horizontally directed audio channels. The number after the first decimal, if applicable, is the number of subwoofer outputs or channels. The number after the second decimal, if applicable, is the number of height or atmospheric channels designed to immerse the listener by producing overhead sound effects.

There are a few HDR formats that tell the TV or other HDR-compatible product how to best utilize its capabilities to display HDR content. HDR technology can support one or multiple formats, each with various benefits to picture quality.
The number and type of USB ports the product has.
This is technology that's specific to a TV brand (sometimes called proprietary technology). Here you'll see terms related to picture quality, brightness, processors and more.

Surround sound systems use multiple audio channels and speakers to create an immersive sound experience for the listener. There are also various proprietary technologies that imitate this kind of sound via a device's built-in speakers or soundbar.
The manner in which a device sends data to another device over a short distance without the use of wires or cables.

Backward, downward, and front-firing speakers direct sound into the room from those respective directions. A soundbar is typically long and rectangular, and designed to act as an all-in-one speaker with greater sound production than that of a TV alone. An acoustic surface is the result of small sound actuators embedded directly behind the screen, turning the entire screen's surface into a speaker.
Refers to the number of pixels, both horizontally and vertically, used to capture video/images. The higher the resolution the finer the detail that can be seen.
The out of box width of the item. Width is measured as the horizontal distance from one side of the item to the other as it would be primarily used or placed.
Feature that blocks television programming if it has a content rating outside of the acceptable rating(s) configured by the user.
A measure of the total light output.

specifications.definition: Part of a group of the same product type with similar features.
The device features an interface that allows for the connection of headphones.
The device is capable of connecting to another device in order to send or receive streaming content. Share content from your mobile device to your TV or vice versa.
Predicted cost of operating the product under average conditions for one year.
Smart, or smart-capable devices are able to connect directly to your home network in order to stream content from the Internet, run Internet-based apps, or connect to other smart devices.
Proprietary technologies produced in addition to the Refresh Rate that smooth out faster moving pictures to reduce blur and pixelation.
The group size measurement of a screen. This differs from a screen size measured diagonally from corner to corner.
An input that receives uncompressed HDMI signals over a category cable point-to-point, up to 100 meters, from a transmitter.
Near field microphones require you to be very close to the device for the sound to be picked up. Far field microphones allow you to speak to a device from a distance.
Indicates the appropriate environment product was designed to be used in.
Amount of power needed to support an electrical current.
The maximum width of a stand or the maximum distance from the outside of one leg to the outside of the opposite leg, as it is attached to the product.
The text version of spoken audio displayed on the screen. Devices that can display closed captioning typically have the option to toggle the feature on or off.
This input is used to connect devices such as antennas or cable boxes to a TV via a coaxial cable.
Compatible with or able to be connected to other smart devices or applications.
A system that converts language text into speech.
Improves clarity of dialogue in audio playback. This is typically achieved with dedicated speakers and/or technology that separates dialogue from the rest of the audio in order to make it clearer.
The total number of USB ports including all generations and versions.
Measurement of electrical power.
A digital assistant built into the device that uses voice commands to answer questions and control smart devices.
The battery size required for operation.
An HDR-compatible 4K TV or other HDR-compatible product displays HDR video content when it's available from sources like 4K Ultra HD Blu-ray Discs and 4K streaming services.

Edge-lit: lights are on the edges of the display with ~10 zones of vertical LEDs. Direct-lit: lights are on the edges and behind the screen for more light uniformity than Edge-lit. Full array: direct-lit with local dimming for greater contrast with up to 100 zones of LEDs.
The available language options for displayed text or captions.

The ATSC TV Tuner is a component built into conventional TV sets or other devices for receiving over-the-air broadcast TV without a cable/satellite box. Digital tuners may be purchased separately and connected to a device if it does not have one built in.
Predicted amount of electricity needed to operate the product under average conditions for one year.
The number and type of connectors used to connect to an external display.
Generally, these technologies allow syncing between a computer/console game's frame rate and the device's refresh rate for a smoother display without tearing.

The Electronic Product Environmental Assessment Tool (EPEAT) was designed to provide an environmental assessment tool for purchasers. In order to qualify for EPEAT, a product must meet all 23 required criteria.
VESA wall mount standards refer to the spacing of screw holes built into a TV in order to fit with standard TV wall mounts. These standards are implemented into most TVs and monitors.
Casts the screen of one device onto another wirelessly, using a common protocol (typically Bluetooth).

Indicates whether the device features descriptive video service (DVS). This service provides narration of key elements in the program, such as actions, costumes, and scene changes, to help engage visually-impaired audiences.

Just like a computer, a smart TV needs an operating system (also called a smart platform) in order to access the Internet, connect with entertainment apps, and play streaming content. Some common TV smart platforms are; Roku TV, Android TV, and Chromecast.
Whether the stand can adjust to have more than one measurement either between the legs or the base itself.
Streaming services and other programs are available on this device. Keep in mind, there may be more services supported than just those shown here.
The minimum width of a stand or the minimum distance from the outside of one leg to the outside of the opposite leg, as it is attached to the product.
Size of the screen, measured diagonally from corner to corner.
The number of frames per second the device can produce natively without enhancement. Higher rates help produce smooth, seamless pictures.
The Bluetooth specification formalized by the Bluetooth Special Interest Group. All versions of the Bluetooth standard are backwards compatible with previous versions.

description: Shop LG 65" Class C4 Series OLED evo 4K UHD Smart webOS TV (2024) at Best Buy. Find low everyday prices and buy online for delivery or in-store pick-up. Price Match Guarantee.

reviews.name: Great bang for the buck!
reviews.reviewBody: Best bang for the buck in my opiniin. So far, I'm as impressed as i thought I'd be from comparing so many tv's for so long on line and then finally going to BestBuy to compare them side by side. I went during the 4th of July sale and the LG C4 and B4 evo ( among other tv's ) had some great sale prices. I had a number of employees approach my wife and I for help and they were all helpful but not pushy. I asked each one of them questions and they were able to help answer them. Yet, i still had a difficult time making a decision. So many great options. One employee in particular, started talking with me about the finer points and details of each one. I almost bought the Samsung s95c  but the 48" B4 evo was half priced and was too good of a deal to pass up to replace a 14 year old 1080P Sony Bravia, which I had been contemplating replacing for quite a while.

reviews.name: Beautiful picture and great features!
reviews.reviewBody: As a previous owner of a eight year old 55" LG OLED I was already aware of the outstanding picture quality. I absolutely love this tv and I found the 'Personalized Picture Wizard' in the settings worked very well for me. It actually got the picture I wanted compared to my own settings. It turned out to be really helpful for my 70 year old eyes, lol. This tv has many other great features also. I've had this tv a month and am still discovering new things I can do.

reviews.name: Amazing OLED TV
reviews.reviewBody: Amazing TV!  It was an amazing upgrade from my 2015 LED UHD TV.  The picture quality difference between my old TV and this LG TV is stunning.

primaryImage.altText: LG OLED evo AI -

descriptions.long: The advanced LG OLED evo C4-Series is better than ever. The LG OLED evo C4 is powered by the next-gen α9 Gen7 AI Processor —exclusively made for LG OLED—for ultra-realistic picture and sound along with boosted brightness for luminosity and high contrast, even in well-lit rooms.¹ AI-assisted deep learning analyzes what you're watching to choose the best picture and sound setting for your content. The C4's almost invisible bezel, ensures it blends with your surroundings. When you're finished watching, display art, photos and other content make the C4 a versatile statement piece. Search less and stream more, thanks to the next generation of AI technology from LG webOS 24. Dolby Vision for extraordinary color, contrast and brightness, plus Dolby Atmos² for sound you can feel all around you. And FILMMAKER MODE allows you to see films just as the director intended.

features.title: 4K Ultra HD (2160p resolution)
features.description: Enjoy breathtaking HDR10 4K movies and TV shows at 4 times the resolution of Full HD, and upscale your current content to Ultra HD-level picture quality.

features.title: High Dynamic Range
features.description: Provides a wide range of color details and sharper contrast, from the brightest whites to the deepest blacks.

features.title: Alexa voice control
features.description: The Alexa Voice Remote lets you easily control your entertainment, search across apps, switch inputs, and more using just your voice. Press and hold the voice button and ask Alexa to easily find, launch, and control content, and even switch to cable.

features.title: Access thousands of shows with Fire TV
features.description: Watch over 500,000 streaming movies and TV episodes with access to thousands of channels, apps and Alexa skills, including Apple TV+, Disney+, Hulu, Netflix, Prime Video, Sling TV, YouTube and other services right from this TV.*

features.title: DTS Studio Sound
features.description: This premium audio enhancement suite creates realistic and immersive audio with two-speaker playback that expands your sense of space and ambience.

features.title: Supports HDMI ARC and HDMI eARC
features.description: Sends audio directly from the HDMI jack to a compatible soundbar or AV receiver, removing the need for an extra cable.

features.title: Versatile connections
features.description: Connect your home theater components such as a Blu-ray player, game console, speakers, cable/antenna and more. TV connections include 3 HDMI ports, composite (AV) jacks, digital optical output, USB port, headphone jack, coaxial jack, ethernet port and Wi-Fi technology.

features.title: LED-backlit LCD screen
features.description: With reliable and long-lasting LED lighting, this LCD screen delivers a wide range of colors and contrast for a memorable viewing experience.

features.title: Parental controls
features.description: Manage your children’s viewing by blocking content based on program ratings or entire channels. Once the kids are in bed, access whatever you want with a simple PIN.

features.title: Wall mountable
features.description: Compatible with VESA pattern 400 × 300 for simple and safe wall mounting.

features.title: Supports Apple AirPlay
features.description: Share videos, photos, music and more from an Apple device to your TV with the touch of a button.

features.title: Sustainably Focused
features.description: The outer package for this product has been manufactured with sustainably sourced paper, certified by the Forest Stewardship Council (FSC®). FSC certification ensures that packaging comes from responsibly managed forests to help protect the planet—today and tomorrow.
*Web-based services and content require high-speed Internet service. Some services may require a subscription.

reviews.reviewBody:
Title: Great Entry-Level TV with Surprising Performance

I recently purchased the 32-inch Insignia TV, and overall, I am quite pleased with its performance. Here's my detailed review based on my individual experience using it:

Firstly, the size of the TV is perfect for smaller spaces like bedrooms or kitchens. It doesn't overpower the room but still provides a decent viewing experience. The 720p resolution may not be the highest available, but for everyday use, it is more than sufficient.

The display quality exceeded my expectations. The colors are vibrant, and the contrast is impressive, resulting in a sharp and detailed image. I was particularly surprised by the wider viewing angles, allowing everyone in the room to enjoy the picture without any noticeable distortion.

In terms of sound quality, the built-in speakers deliver clear and decent audio. While it might not match a high-end home theater system, it is more than satisfactory for regular TV viewing. Additionally, the TV offers various audio settings, allowing you to adjust it to your liking.

Setting up the TV was a breeze, thanks to the straightforward on-screen guide. It connected effortlessly to my cable box, streaming devices, and gaming consoles. The HDMI and USB ports are conveniently located on the side, making it easy to access and connect various devices.

One feature that impressed me was the user-friendly interface. Navigating through menus and settings was intuitive, and I was able to customize the TV to my preferences quickly. The remote control, although basic, was responsive and easy to use.

However, the TV does have a few drawbacks. While the overall build quality is decent, the plastic frame feels a bit flimsy. Additionally, the TV lacks advanced image processing capabilities, so fast-moving scenes or sports might display some motion blur.

Considering its affordable price point, the 32-inch Insignia TV provides excellent value for money. It offers solid display quality, good sound, and easy setup, making it a great option for those seeking an entry-level TV. I feel that it meets all the essential criteria one would expect from a television in this price range.

In conclusion, if you're in the market for a budget-friendly TV with surprising performance, the 32-inch Insignia TV is a solid choice. It may not have all the bells and whistles of high-end models, but it more than makes up for it with its impressive display quality and user-friendly interface.

reviews.name: Insignia
reviews.reviewBody: This television was a very good move for us.It was very easy to set up and has a very good picture. I would recommend this purchase for anyone looking for an inexpensive but practical set.

reviews.name: Perfect Little TV
reviews.reviewBody: Not sure what else you need.  Has it all.   Picture is great.  Easy to use.  And it’s Smart!   Lightweight and easy to mount.  Highly recommended.  Cannot be beat for the price and features.   Buy it.  No brainer.

specifications.definition: Devices carrying the ENERGY STAR service mark, such as computer products and peripherals, kitchen appliances, and other products, generally use 20% to 30% less energy than required by federal standards.
The number and type of USB ports the product has.

Surround sound systems use multiple audio channels and speakers to create an immersive sound experience for the listener. There are also various proprietary technologies that imitate this kind of sound via a device's built-in speakers or soundbar.
The manner in which a device sends data to another device over a short distance without the use of wires or cables.

Backward, downward, and front-firing speakers direct sound into the room from those respective directions. A soundbar is typically long and rectangular, and designed to act as an all-in-one speaker with greater sound production than that of a TV alone. An acoustic surface is the result of small sound actuators embedded directly behind the screen, turning the entire screen's surface into a speaker.
Refers to the number of pixels, both horizontally and vertically, used to capture video/images. The higher the resolution the finer the detail that can be seen.
The ability for a device to perform a specific function, or functions, based on a spoken command, that is received by a microphone integrated with the device.
The out of box width of the item. Width is measured as the horizontal distance from one side of the item to the other as it would be primarily used or placed.
Feature that blocks television programming if it has a content rating outside of the acceptable rating(s) configured by the user.
The horizontal measurement of the stand/base, or the distance from the outside of one leg to the outside of the opposite leg, as it is attached to the product.

specifications.definition: Part of a group of the same product type with similar features.
The device features an interface that allows for the connection of headphones.
The device is capable of connecting to another device in order to send or receive streaming content. Share content from your mobile device to your TV or vice versa.
Predicted cost of operating the product under average conditions for one year.
Smart, or smart-capable devices are able to connect directly to your home network in order to stream content from the Internet, run Internet-based apps, or connect to other smart devices.
The group size measurement of a screen. This differs from a screen size measured diagonally from corner to corner.
Indicates the appropriate environment product was designed to be used in.
The text version of spoken audio displayed on the screen. Devices that can display closed captioning typically have the option to toggle the feature on or off.

The wireless networking standard used by the device. Each iteration of the standard developed by the Wi-Fi Alliance corresponds to an existing IEEE 802.11 protocol; for example, standard 802.11ac (or AC) is termed Wi-Fi 5. Refers specifically to the standard the device is designed to use, but ultimately determines product interoperability and backward compatibility including previous versions.
This input is used to connect devices such as antennas or cable boxes to a TV via a coaxial cable.
Compatible with or able to be connected to other smart devices or applications.
A system that converts language text into speech.
The total number of USB ports including all generations and versions.
A digital assistant built into the device that uses voice commands to answer questions and control smart devices.
The battery size required for operation.
An HDR-compatible 4K TV or other HDR-compatible product displays HDR video content when it's available from sources like 4K Ultra HD Blu-ray Discs and 4K streaming services.

Edge-lit: lights are on the edges of the display with ~10 zones of vertical LEDs. Direct-lit: lights are on the edges and behind the screen for more light uniformity than Edge-lit. Full array: direct-lit with local dimming for greater contrast with up to 100 zones of LEDs.
The available language options for displayed text or captions.

The ATSC TV Tuner is a component built into conventional TV sets or other devices for receiving over-the-air broadcast TV without a cable/satellite box. Digital tuners may be purchased separately and connected to a device if it does not have one built in.
Predicted amount of electricity needed to operate the product under average conditions for one year.
The number and type of connectors used to connect to an external display.

The Electronic Product Environmental Assessment Tool (EPEAT) was designed to provide an environmental assessment tool for purchasers. In order to qualify for EPEAT, a product must meet all 23 required criteria.
VESA wall mount standards refer to the spacing of screw holes built into a TV in order to fit with standard TV wall mounts. These standards are implemented into most TVs and monitors.
Casts the screen of one device onto another wirelessly, using a common protocol (typically Bluetooth).

Indicates whether the device features descriptive video service (DVS). This service provides narration of key elements in the program, such as actions, costumes, and scene changes, to help engage visually-impaired audiences.

Just like a computer, a smart TV needs an operating system (also called a smart platform) in order to access the Internet, connect with entertainment apps, and play streaming content. Some common TV smart platforms are; Roku TV, Android TV, and Chromecast.
Whether the stand can adjust to have more than one measurement either between the legs or the base itself.
Streaming services and other programs are available on this device. Keep in mind, there may be more services supported than just those shown here.
Size of the screen, measured diagonally from corner to corner.
The number of frames per second the device can produce natively without enhancement. Higher rates help produce smooth, seamless pictures.
The Bluetooth specification formalized by the Bluetooth Special Interest Group. All versions of the Bluetooth standard are backwards compatible with previous versions.

features.title: Alexa voice control
features.description: The Alexa Voice Remote lets you easily control your entertainment, search across apps, switch inputs, and more using just your voice. Press and hold the voice button and ask Alexa to easily find, launch, and control content, and even switch to cable.

features.title: Access millions of shows with Fire TV
features.description: Watch over 1 million streaming movies and TV episodes with access to thousands of channels, apps and Alexa skills, including Netflix, Apple TV, Prime Video, Disney +, Hulu, Sling TV, YouTube, HBO Max, Spotify, Peacock, ESPN+ and more right from this TV.*

features.title: DTS TruSurround
features.description: This multi-channel format creates an immersive surround sound experience through your TV’s speakers.

features.title: Supports Apple AirPlay
features.description: Share videos, photos, music and more from an Apple device to your TV with the touch of a button.

features.title: Supports HDMI ARC
features.description: Sends audio directly from the HDMI jack to a compatible soundbar or AV receiver, removing the need for an extra cable.

features.title: 720p resolution
features.description: Watch movies and TV shows in high-definition picture quality.

features.title: Versatile connections
features.description: Connect your home theater components such as a Blu-ray player, game console, speakers, cable/antenna and more. TV connections include 3 HDMI ports, composite (AV) jacks, digital optical output, USB port, headphone jack, coaxial jack, ethernet port and Wi-Fi technology.

features.title: LED-backlit LCD screen
features.description: With reliable and long-lasting LED lighting, this LCD screen delivers a wide range of colors and contrast for a memorable viewing experience.

features.title: Parental controls
features.description: Manage your children’s viewing by blocking content based on program ratings or entire channels. Once the kids are in bed, access whatever you want with a simple PIN.

features.title: Wall mountable
features.description: Compatible with VESA pattern 100 × 100 for simple and safe wall mounting.

features.title: Sustainably Focused
features.description: The outer package for this product has been manufactured with sustainably sourced paper, certified by the Forest Stewardship Council (FSC®). FSC certification ensures that packaging comes from responsibly managed forests to help protect the planet—today and tomorrow.
*Web-based services and content require high-speed Internet service. Some services may require a subscription.

features.title: OLED Technology
features.description: Discover pure blacks, bright whites and Pantone-validated color. Combined with detail and brightness, this pixel-packed screen gives you a dramatic view for everything you watch.

features.title: OLED HDR +
features.description: Enjoy powerful brightness and rich contrast. Your TV analyzes each scene to boost brightness and improve image clarity.

features.title: Motion Xcelerator Turbo+4
features.description: Play games and content with ultra-smooth motion and virtually no lag or blur. Get uninterrupted action with crisp visuals rendered at top speeds.¹

features.title: 4K AI Upscaling
features.description: Instantly transforms lower resolution content into 4K using AI technology. Whether you’re watching an HD movie, live sports or even looking back at home videos, get enhanced clarity with our high-performance, AI-powered processor that upgrades your content scene by scene.²

features.title: Real Depth Enhancer
features.description: Experience depth and dimension on screen just the way you see it in real life. Real Depth Enhancer creates an immersive experience on your 4K AI TV by mirroring how the human eye processes depth by increasing foreground contrast. For all content, this simple adjustment brings the picture that much closer to reality.

features.title: Dolby Atmos and Object Tracking Sound Lite
features.description: Keep your ears on the action with built-in Dolby Atmos. You’ll hear 3D surround sound that follows the movement on screen using our incredible virtual top channel audio – putting you right in the middle of the car chase, stampede, or party scene.

features.title: NQ4 AI Gen2 Processor
features.description: The power behind the 4K picture that actively improves the quality. Utilizing 20 specialized networks the AI-powered processor drives the intuitive Smart TV Hub, Dolby Atmos sound, and expertly upscaled 4K resolution.

features.title: Samsung Tizen OS
features.description: Stream your favorite shows. Play games. Work out with a trainer. Do all you enjoy with Smart TV Powered by Tizen. Discover your must-have apps and streaming services all just a few clicks away.³

features.title: PANTONE Validated
features.description: Enjoy color validated by industry leading experts at Pantone®, so that images on the screen look as incredible as they do in real life. Every hue, tint and skin tone offers a more accurate and beautiful picture.

features.title: Gaming Hub
features.description: Where gaming comes together. Stream your favorite games right from your TV. No console required.⁴

features.title: TV Speakers and Soundbar in Sync
features.description: Only Samsung gives you the power to unlock incredible when you pair your TV with a soundbar. With Q-Symphony, your TV speakers paired with Q-Series and S-Series soundbar operate as one. Together, they can optimize all the channels to bring you our most powerful sound experience.⁶

features.title: Active Voice Amplifier Pro
features.description: Samsung AI TV technology leverages AI to analyze audio, distinguishing and amplifying voices against background sounds, both within the scene and within your room. That means you can hear dialogue clearly, even in the most chaotic scenes.

features.title: AI Customization Mode
features.description: AI detects what you’re watching and automatically optimizes the TV’s settings for the best viewing experience. Set your preferred picture style by content type – from sports to horror – and then let AI technology do the work.

features.title: AI Energy Mode
features.description: Sensors and the TV’s processor work together to analyze on-screen content and ambient lighting to automatically adjust your picture settings to reduce energy usage.*

disclaimers: ¹ Motion Xcelerator Turbo+ requires compatible content connection from compatible PCs. Motion Xcelerator Turbo+ is sometimes called Motion Xcelerator 144Hz.
² Utilizes AI-based formulas

³ Samsung Account required for network-based smart services, including streaming apps and other smart features. Separate [connected] computer, mobile or other device may be necessary to create/log in to Samsung Account (free to download and create). Without Account log in, only external device connections (e.g., via HDMI) and terrestrial/over-the-air TV (only for TVs with tuners) available.

⁴ 3High speed internet connection, additional gaming service subscriptions and compatible controller required. *Samsung Account required for network-based smart services, including streaming apps and other smart features. Separate [connected] computer, mobile or other device may be necessary to create/log in to Samsung Account (free to download and create). Without Account log in, only external device connections (e.g., via HDMI) and terrestrial/over-the-air TV.

⁵ High speed internet connection, additional gaming service subscriptions and compatible controller required. *Samsung Account required for network based smart services, including streaming apps and other smart features. Separate [connected] computer, mobile or other device may be necessary to create/log in to Samsung Account (free to download and create).
⁶ Q-Symphony requires compatible 2020-2024 Samsung TV and either a Q-series or S-series soundbar.

*SmartThings account required. Download the app from the Galaxy Store, Play Store, or App Store. The app requires Android OS 9 or later with a minimum of 3GB RAM space or iOS 14 or later. All devices must be connected to Wi-Fi or another wireless network and registered with a single Samsung account.

reviews.name: This TV is absolutely amazing
reviews.reviewBody: This Is hands down the best TV i have ever owned, its sound quality is amazing where I'm ok with my old soundbar (optical input) isnt compatible with it. The TV audio has depth to it. I still recommend getting a sound bar tho for the best possible experience.  The picture quality is clear as ever! I bought this TV back in august when my samsung 2018 finally broke down and needed to buy a new one on spot. This beauty is a beast and slaps my old tv out of existence! The bezeless display is a nice touch! It has a gaming hub for streaming games through xbox game pass or geforce now and if you have a switch or ps5 it auto detects and places it their as inputs. 10/10 TV I love it! Literally 0 complaints

reviews.name: Very good unit for the price.
reviews.reviewBody: We purchased this television to go in my wife's sewing room.  It was lightweight, easy to setup, and the video is completely satisfactory.  The price was excellent and I would definitely buy another.

reviews.name: Best Buy Is The Best!
reviews.reviewBody:
Yes! This 50” Samsung Crystal HD TV is great! 
It’s an Amazing upgrade from the 43 inch offbrand TV I originally had! Plus the quality and functionality having a Samsung TV that pairs up perfectly with the Samsung theater sound system I had also purchased from Best Buy last year! Everything works simultaneously between the TV and the theater Soundsystem with one simple Samsung remote control!
Additionally, the Best Buy geek squad did an amazing job of mounting my new TV and pairing it up with my Samsung Soundsystem.
Best Buy has it all best quality products with the best prices along with best customer service!

reviews.name: Is It Real or Is It Roku
reviews.reviewBody:
I was watching a neighbor's Roku TV when I decided it was time to bite the bullet and get my own.  This was one of the best Tech decisions I made.

I went to BestBuy to check out my options.  The only thing that floored me more than the screen was the price.  The price was so inexpensive, I didn't even think about the brand.  What is the worse thing that could happen if you made a bad decision?  

The TV itself was light,which made it easy to take out of the box and set up.  It even made it easy to mount once I installed the mount.  The remote control was simple, which for me is a huge plus.  (I am old enough to remember when TVs were simple, and parents used children as the remote control.  LOL)  

Once I finally mounted the TV, I was ready to watch.  The set up was also simple, and navigating to where you wanted to go was easy.  Lots of choices without having to pay for anything.  I watched a Lynyrd Skynyrd  documentary, COPS (in Florida no less), Shark Squandron (en español), and all for Free!!!  And then I found out you could stream Bloomberg! 

The picture was phenomenal.  It really looks better than life.  I couldn't believe I was getting this all through my AT&T WiFi.  I didn't think it would have the bandwidth, especially since I had my laptop connected as well.  

A couple of "shortcomings," in my view.  Nothing major.   

Once the TV connects to the WiFi, its hard to get it to realize it is also connected to an over-the-air antenna.  (Roku probably wants to keep you on their platform.  LOL)  I am sure there is a way to point it to the antenna, but I didn't bother trying to figure it out.  

Another shortcoming is how much of my monthly 100GB of traffic it used on my AT&T hotspot.  (That's really not the TV's fault, but it did take me by surprise when I was notified after 3 days that I only had like 35 Gigs left, and the month only started the day before I turned on the TV for the first time.)  I also wouldn't be surprised if it s using the internet when it is plugged in and turned off.  (I wouldn't be surprised if the TV is spying on you when its off.  LOL)   

I am very happy with my purchase, and look forward to using it more once I get wired internet with no data cap.

And even your deepest couch cushions are no match for the lost remote finder. A smart TV made by Roku? Now that makes sense.

reviews.name: Fantastic Patio TV
reviews.reviewBody:
Installed this TV on my back porch, and for the price, it is excellent.  I also purchased the Best Buy Essentials mounting bracket, and it may be better than the TV.  Really solid, very impressed.

1. The ease of setup.  I've seen some folks argue that Roku is better etc.  Possibly, but I'm in the Amazon Fire ecosystem, so I went with a Fire TV.  I have nothing bad to say.  I actually figured out how to make some changes to the home screen, specifically the apps in the quick look, how to change them to the ones I use.  Big help.

I also was able to get every single app I needed.  I hooked up a DirecTV box so I have that, but I also downloaded the DirecTV streaming app, so I will have full DirecTV if rain shuts down the satellite, although if it's raining that hard, I might not be on the patio.

I did have to reverify logging into all the apps, ESPN+ etc.  but the QR code makes it far easier.

2. Installation was super easy.  I've done a lot of work around the house, so I'm not a novice, but this has been more difficult with other installs.  The Insignia TV is flat on back so the brackets go on easy, I used the Essentials and for a 65" to go up that easy, was nice.

3. Sound is actually pretty good.  I didn't get a sound bar, just TV speakers, and it works well.  I also use audio out to a Brookstone Wireless speakers and that was super easy.  I've had the speakers for 9 or 10 years, ha, no need to replace if I don't have to.  Plus, I can still use TV speakers and the wireless to place sound out by the pool, I float and watch the Astros a lot.

4. Picture is very good.  I try to remember, whatever TV I purchase, it won't be on the wall next to the $5,000 tv for comparison at my house.  The picture is vibrant, motion excellent, and set up 4k to DirecTV easily.  

5. Remote is pretty solid as well.  It looks almost exactly like a Fire Stick remote, so I know how to use it.  

Overall, I have to say that this is an excellent purchase.  Snappy user interface, works quicker than the fire stick's I've used.  Setting it up was very easy, and the sound and audio on a back patio is excellent.

There is some glare, but I don't believe any TV made would not have some out there during the day.  It's on vibrant mode and it pops.  The 4K game jumped off the screen.  Overall, very happy for a $349 tv.  At this point, I'm really curious what more expensive TV's have?  I really don't know what they would provide that would need me to spend thousands when this tv works this well.

reviews.name: Impressive for value for the size
reviews.reviewBody: I recently purchased the 65-inch Insignia TV and I have to say, I'm thoroughly impressed with what I got for the price. The picture quality is surprisingly crisp and clear, especially considering the size of the screen. The colors are vibrant, and the contrast ratio is quite impressive for a TV in this price range. Setup was a breeze, with easy-to-follow instructions and intuitive menus. The built-in smart features are also a nice bonus, allowing me to access my favorite streaming apps without needing any additional devices. Overall, I'm extremely happy with my purchase of the 65-inch Insignia TV. It offers excellent value for the size, delivering a big-screen experience without breaking the bank. If you're in the market for a budget-friendly TV with solid performance, I highly recommend giving this one a try.

reviews.name: My new favorite TV
reviews.reviewBody: This 4K Smart TV is amazing! The pictures look super clear and colorful. It's easy to use, and you can watch lots of shows on it. The TV looks cool, and you can connect it to other stuff easily. I really like it – perfect for watching movies and shows!

descriptions.long: Take in every moment with breathtaking 4K Ultra HD on this 65-inch screen. It’s equipped with DTS Studio Sound to create realistic and immersive audio. Access live over-the-air channels and streaming—and control it all with your voice. Ask Alexa to launch apps, search for titles and more. Experience the affordable, yet high-performing Insignia NS-65F301NA23 65" Class F30 Series LED 4K UHD Smart Fire TV.

specifications.definition: Devices carrying the ENERGY STAR service mark, such as computer products and peripherals, kitchen appliances, and other products, generally use 20% to 30% less energy than required by federal standards.

There are a few HDR formats that tell the TV or other HDR-compatible product how to best utilize its capabilities to display HDR content. HDR technology can support one or multiple formats, each with various benefits to picture quality.
The number and type of USB ports the product has.

Surround sound systems use multiple audio channels and speakers to create an immersive sound experience for the listener. There are also various proprietary technologies that imitate this kind of sound via a device's built-in speakers or soundbar.
The manner in which a device sends data to another device over a short distance without the use of wires or cables.

Backward, downward, and front-firing speakers direct sound into the room from those respective directions. A soundbar is typically long and rectangular, and designed to act as an all-in-one speaker with greater sound production than that of a TV alone. An acoustic surface is the result of small sound actuators embedded directly behind the screen, turning the entire screen's surface into a speaker.
Refers to the number of pixels, both horizontally and vertically, used to capture video/images. The higher the resolution the finer the detail that can be seen.
The out of box width of the item. Width is measured as the horizontal distance from one side of the item to the other as it would be primarily used or placed.
Feature that blocks television programming if it has a content rating outside of the acceptable rating(s) configured by the user.
The horizontal measurement of the stand/base, or the distance from the outside of one leg to the outside of the opposite leg, as it is attached to the product.

specifications.definition: Part of a group of the same product type with similar features.
The device features an interface that allows for the connection of headphones.
The device is capable of connecting to another device in order to send or receive streaming content. Share content from your mobile device to your TV or vice versa.
Predicted cost of operating the product under average conditions for one year.
Smart, or smart-capable devices are able to connect directly to your home network in order to stream content from the Internet, run Internet-based apps, or connect to other smart devices.
Proprietary technologies produced in addition to the Refresh Rate that smooth out faster moving pictures to reduce blur and pixelation.
The group size measurement of a screen. This differs from a screen size measured diagonally from corner to corner.
Indicates the appropriate environment product was designed to be used in.
Amount of power needed to support an electrical current.
The text version of spoken audio displayed on the screen. Devices that can display closed captioning typically have the option to toggle the feature on or off.

The wireless networking standard used by the device. Each iteration of the standard developed by the Wi-Fi Alliance corresponds to an existing IEEE 802.11 protocol; for example, standard 802.11ac (or AC) is termed Wi-Fi 5. Refers specifically to the standard the device is designed to use, but ultimately determines product interoperability and backward compatibility including previous versions.
This input is used to connect devices such as antennas or cable boxes to a TV via a coaxial cable.
Compatible with or able to be connected to other smart devices or applications.
A system that converts language text into speech.
The total number of USB ports including all generations and versions.
A digital assistant built into the device that uses voice commands to answer questions and control smart devices.
The battery size required for operation.
An HDR-compatible 4K TV or other HDR-compatible product displays HDR video content when it's available from sources like 4K Ultra HD Blu-ray Discs and 4K streaming services.

Edge-lit: lights are on the edges of the display with ~10 zones of vertical LEDs. Direct-lit: lights are on the edges and behind the screen for more light uniformity than Edge-lit. Full array: direct-lit with local dimming for greater contrast with up to 100 zones of LEDs.
The available language options for displayed text or captions.

The ATSC TV Tuner is a component built into conventional TV sets or other devices for receiving over-the-air broadcast TV without a cable/satellite box. Digital tuners may be purchased separately and connected to a device if it does not have one built in.
Predicted amount of electricity needed to operate the product under average conditions for one year.
The number and type of connectors used to connect to an external display.
Generally, these technologies allow syncing between a computer/console game's frame rate and the device's refresh rate for a smoother display without tearing.

The Electronic Product Environmental Assessment Tool (EPEAT) was designed to provide an environmental assessment tool for purchasers. In order to qualify for EPEAT, a product must meet all 23 required criteria.
VESA wall mount standards refer to the spacing of screw holes built into a TV in order to fit with standard TV wall mounts. These standards are implemented into most TVs and monitors.
Casts the screen of one device onto another wirelessly, using a common protocol (typically Bluetooth).

Indicates whether the device features descriptive video service (DVS). This service provides narration of key elements in the program, such as actions, costumes, and scene changes, to help engage visually-impaired audiences.

Just like a computer, a smart TV needs an operating system (also called a smart platform) in order to access the Internet, connect with entertainment apps, and play streaming content. Some common TV smart platforms are; Roku TV, Android TV, and Chromecast.
Whether the stand can adjust to have more than one measurement either between the legs or the base itself.
Streaming services and other programs are available on this device. Keep in mind, there may be more services supported than just those shown here.
Size of the screen, measured diagonally from corner to corner.
The number of frames per second the device can produce natively without enhancement. Higher rates help produce smooth, seamless pictures.
The Bluetooth specification formalized by the Bluetooth Special Interest Group. All versions of the Bluetooth standard are backwards compatible with previous versions.

features.title: Alexa voice control
features.description: The Alexa Voice Remote lets you easily control your entertainment, search across apps, switch inputs, and more using just your voice. Press and hold the voice button and ask Alexa to easily find, launch, and control content, and even switch to cable.

features.title: Access millions of shows with Fire TV
features.description: Watch over 1 million streaming movies and TV episodes with access to thousands of channels, apps and Alexa skills, including Netflix, Apple TV, Prime Video, Disney +, Hulu, Sling TV, YouTube, HBO Max, Spotify, Peacock, ESPN+ and more right from this TV.*

features.title: DTS Studio Sound
features.description: This premium audio enhancement suite creates realistic and immersive audio with two-speaker playback that expands your sense of space and ambience.

features.title: Supports Apple AirPlay
features.description: Share videos, photos, music and more from an Apple device to your TV with the touch of a button.

features.title: Supports HDMI ARC and HDMI eARC
features.description: Sends audio directly from the HDMI jack to a compatible soundbar or AV receiver, removing the need for an extra cable.

features.title: 4K Ultra HD (2160p resolution)
features.description: Enjoy breathtaking HDR10 4K movies and TV shows at 4 times the resolution of Full HD, and upscale your current content to Ultra HD-level picture quality.

features.title: High Dynamic Range
features.description: Provides a wide range of color details and sharper contrast, from the brightest whites to the deepest blacks.

features.title: Versatile connections
features.description: Connect your home theater components such as a Blu-ray player, game console, speakers, cable/antenna and more. TV connections include 3 HDMI ports, composite (AV) jacks, digital optical output, USB port, headphone jack, coaxial jack, ethernet port and Wi-Fi technology.

features.title: LED-backlit LCD screen
features.description: With reliable and long-lasting LED lighting, this LCD screen delivers a wide range of colors and contrast for a memorable viewing experience.

features.title: Wall mountable
features.description: Compatible with VESA pattern 400 × 300 for simple and safe wall mounting.

features.title: Sustainably Focused
features.description: The outer package for this product has been manufactured with sustainably sourced paper, certified by the Forest Stewardship Council (FSC®). FSC certification ensures that packaging comes from responsibly managed forests to help protect the planet—today and tomorrow.
*Web-based services and content require high-speed Internet service. Some services may require a subscription.

reviews.name: Great TV! Awesome picture!
reviews.reviewBody: Great TV! Awesome picture and the operating system has a lot of options to watch various shows and apps.

reviews.name: MS Jem's TV
reviews.reviewBody: Moved and needed a new TV knew exactly what i wanted, tv looks beautiful in my new home.  Samsung would not disappoint me.. Bought a soundbar which i don't really need.

reviews.name: Good TV. I would purchase it again.
reviews.reviewBody:
This TV is almost TO VIVID.
I have fallen asleep watching and when a bright scene or commercial comes on. It feels like a nuclear bomb going off inside my living room. The light flashes through my eyelids and wakes me up. I’ve never had that experience in my life. It’s a little disconcerting.
Over it’s a good TV. The sound is good if you live in an apartment, I wouldn’t recommend getting the sound bar which I did buy. (Live and learn)

descriptions.long: This advanced TV is a casual gamer's dream with 4K upscaling, little lag and access to thousands of video games no console required.

features.title: Dual LED
features.description: Get a natural, realistic picture and accurate contrast that adapts automatically to match your content.

features.title: 100% Color Volume with Quantum Dot
features.description: Take in breathtaking color that stays true at any level of brightness. Marvel at over a billion beautiful shades on your TV.¹

features.title: Quantum HDR
features.description: View a range of color, contrast and detail. Vibrant imagery brings full power to the picture.

features.title: Motion Xcelerator Turbo
features.description: Experience smooth action with exceptional motion enhancements for a seamless picture.²

features.title: Quantum Processor 4K with AI Upscaling
features.description: Powers your TV’s 4K HDR picture and sound for clear resolution and contrast.

features.title: Object Tracking Sound Lite
features.description: You’ll hear 3D surround sound that follows the movement on screen using our incredible virtual top channel audio.

features.title: Samsung Tizen OS
features.description: Stream your favorite shows. Play games. Work out with a trainer. Do all you enjoy with Smart TV Powered by Tizen. Discover your must have apps and streaming services all just a few clicks away. ³

features.title: PANTONE Validated
features.description: Enjoy color validated by industry leading experts at Pantone, so that images on the screen look as incredible as they do in real life. Every hue, tint and skin tone offers a more accurate and beautiful picture.

features.title: EyeComfort Mode
features.description: From day to night, the amount of blue light automatically adjusts for your eyes. With sunrise and sunset times built in, it intelligently adapts your display and reduces blue light to help keep your eyes more comfortable.

features.title: Gaming Hub
features.description: Where gaming comes together. Stream your favorite games right from your TV. No console required. You’ll also get recommendations on what to play next, based on what you like.⁴

features.title: TV  Speakers and Soundbar in Sync
features.description: Only Samsung gives you the power to unlock incredible when you pair your TV with a soundbar. With Q-Symphony, your TV speakers paired with Q-Series and S-Series soundbar operate as one. Together, they can optimize all the channels to bring you our most powerful sound experience ⁵

disclaimers: ¹ QLED televisions can produce 100% Color Volume in the DCI P3 color space, the format for most cinema screens and HDR movies for television.
² Motion Xcelerator Turbo is sometimes called Motion Xcelerator 120Hz.

³ Samsung Account required for network based smart services, including streaming apps and other smart features. Separate [connected] computer, mobile or other device may be necessary to create/log in to Samsung Account (free to download and create). Without Account log in, only external device connections (e.g., via HDMI) and terrestrial/over the air TV (only for TVs with tuners) available.

⁴ High speed internet connection, additional gaming service subscriptions and compatible controller required. *Samsung Account required for network based smart services, including streaming apps and other smart features. Separate [connected] computer, mobile or other device may be necessary to create/log in to Samsung Account (free to download and create). Without Account log in, only external device connections (e.g., via HDMI)
⁵ Q-Symphony requires compatible 2020-2024 Samsung TV and either a Q-series or S-series soundbar

name: LG - 55” Class UT75 Series LED 4K UHD Smart webOS TV (2024)
description: Shop LG 55” Class UT75 Series LED 4K UHD Smart webOS TV (2024) at Best Buy. Find low everyday prices and buy online for delivery or in-store pick-up. Price Match Guarantee.

reviews.name: Hope I don't regret this purchase
reviews.reviewBody: First LG tv ever. I'm a loyal Samsung consumer but decided to give this LG smart tv a shot after recommendations of how much better LG is over Samsung. So far i'm up in the air about this tv. The magic remote is a bit hard to navigate. Also the number pad doesn't work with the Xfinity stream app (Probably another Xfinity flaw) so I have to press the down arrow, all the way down to the channel I need. Maybe its a rookie error but my cursor doesn't appear on the screen. Its probably too late to return this product even though I just bought it (Box was already trashed). Picture is nice though

reviews.name: Tinker with the settings before ya knock it
reviews.reviewBody: Amazing, the picture quality is like no other if you tinker with the settings properly, spent 20-30 mins tinkering with them and the quality is just stunning, the colors are pure, no interface nor controller lag, handles any movie perfectly, the ai audio feature makes the audio great for the built in speakers, nice and light so it was easy to wall mount solo, would recommend 10/10, the remote has alot of buttons for a smart tv, was easy to learn the optimal hand position on it.

reviews.name: Vibrant colors
reviews.reviewBody: Techninician arrived on time, professional, answered all my questions, and even gave the fastest way to contact support for the future. Vibrant colors, sound quality very good.

primaryImage.altText: Front. LG - 55” Class UT75 Series LED 4K UHD Smart webOS TV (2024).

descriptions.long: Bring home 4K resolution in an impressive range of screen sizes with LG UHD TVs. Enjoy swift, easy browsing and tons of personalized recommendations including 300+ free LG channels you can't get anywhere else¹.  Spend less time searching and more time streaming with LG webOS 24. Focus on the screen with a slim and simple-to-mount design for a stylish view no matter where you hang it. For gamers, you can quickly customize your gaming experience in one location with the LG Game Optimizer. And, with GeForce NOW included, you can automatically stream and get in the game².

reviews.name: Amazing for the price
reviews.reviewBody:
So I have been using mostly Sony and Samsung TV's for the majority of my life. My old TV finally died and I need something bigger than the my old 32in 1080p Samsung TV. For the price when I got it on sell was a steal, $230 compared to other options at the store. 

I have never used Roku ever before, mostly streamed stuff through my PlayStation. But the Roku software is super simple and straightforward. I enjoy the customization options given from changing sounds, wallpapers, themes, and etc.... Roku is easy to navigate, the remote is compact and simple to use, if you get the Roku app than you can use your phone as a remote instead which is neat. The remote has a 3.5mm headphone jack so you can plug your wired headphones in and listen through them instead through the TV.

The sound is good not great compared to some other TV's, but considering the price it is beyond good. The picture is good and the TV doesn't have much glare to it, I don't know if this is due to the screen being matte but it's good.

Other things I like is the inclusion of the Composite AV ports (red, yellow, white ports) so I can hook up my PlayStation 2 and play it. The Ethernet port is good nothing outstanding just very well built and solid. 

The ARC HDMI is not 2.1 so no 4k 120hz which is a sad and one of my faults I have with it. The USB A ports are not 3.2 I think they are the older USB A ports, so they are not the fastest out there but again they get the job done.

Overall it is a TV that I truly like and would highly recommend it especially if you can get in on sale. If you just want a solid reliable built TV with good sounds and a simple robust smart tv software than I would highly recommend this TV.

reviews.name: Relaxing And Rocking With Roku!!!
reviews.reviewBody: I absolutely LOVE this TV! It was so easy to set up and already having a Roku streaming device made the process so simple! I was able to get my TV on sale and for a 43” I will NOT complain. The screen, picture, and sound is perfect! I would definitely recommend this to a friend! It was worth every penny and I am proud to say that I am a very very happy customer and extremely satisfied with my purchase! 5 stars all the way!!!

reviews.name: Easiest setup ever
reviews.reviewBody: I love my little Roku aTV. All of the TVs in my house are Roku smart TVs. It’s easy to set up and easy to use. I thought the sound needed improvement so I also got a Roku sound bar. I can use one remote for everything. I love that! Great picture too.

videos.title: How to set up a Roku TV

descriptions.long: Roku Select Series 4K TVs are thoughtfully designed to upgrade your entertainment at an incredible value. Enjoy your streaming favorites in brilliant 4K HDR picture that’s optimized for your room lighting with automatic brightness. Catch every word with built-in sound features like auto speech clarity and night mode or enjoy private listening with headphones. Switch to your inputs and watch free live TV right from the home screen, or use the voice remote to find movies, shows, or songs across thousands of channels. And even your deepest couch cushions are no match for the lost remote finder. A smart TV made by Roku? Now that makes sense.

specifications.definition: Devices carrying the ENERGY STAR service mark, such as computer products and peripherals, kitchen appliances, and other products, generally use 20% to 30% less energy than required by federal standards.

There are a few HDR formats that tell the TV or other HDR-compatible product how to best utilize its capabilities to display HDR content. HDR technology can support one or multiple formats, each with various benefits to picture quality.
The number and type of USB ports the product has.
This is technology that's specific to a TV brand (sometimes called proprietary technology). Here you'll see terms related to picture quality, brightness, processors and more.

Surround sound systems use multiple audio channels and speakers to create an immersive sound experience for the listener. There are also various proprietary technologies that imitate this kind of sound via a device's built-in speakers or soundbar.
The manner in which a device sends data to another device over a short distance without the use of wires or cables.
Refers to the number of pixels, both horizontally and vertically, used to capture video/images. The higher the resolution the finer the detail that can be seen.
The out of box width of the item. Width is measured as the horizontal distance from one side of the item to the other as it would be primarily used or placed.
The horizontal measurement of the stand/base, or the distance from the outside of one leg to the outside of the opposite leg, as it is attached to the product.
Part of a group of the same product type with similar features.
The device features an interface that allows for the connection of headphones.
Predicted cost of operating the product under average conditions for one year.
Smart, or smart-capable devices are able to connect directly to your home network in order to stream content from the Internet, run Internet-based apps, or connect to other smart devices.
The group size measurement of a screen. This differs from a screen size measured diagonally from corner to corner.
Indicates the appropriate environment product was designed to be used in.
The text version of spoken audio displayed on the screen. Devices that can display closed captioning typically have the option to toggle the feature on or off.
This input is used to connect devices such as antennas or cable boxes to a TV via a coaxial cable.
Compatible with or able to be connected to other smart devices or applications.
Improves clarity of dialogue in audio playback. This is typically achieved with dedicated speakers and/or technology that separates dialogue from the rest of the audio in order to make it clearer.
The total number of USB ports including all generations and versions.
Measurement of electrical power.
A digital assistant built into the device that uses voice commands to answer questions and control smart devices.
An HDR-compatible 4K TV or other HDR-compatible product displays HDR video content when it's available from sources like 4K Ultra HD Blu-ray Discs and 4K streaming services.

Edge-lit: lights are on the edges of the display with ~10 zones of vertical LEDs. Direct-lit: lights are on the edges and behind the screen for more light uniformity than Edge-lit. Full array: direct-lit with local dimming for greater contrast with up to 100 zones of LEDs.
The available language options for displayed text or captions.

The ATSC TV Tuner is a component built into conventional TV sets or other devices for receiving over-the-air broadcast TV without a cable/satellite box. Digital tuners may be purchased separately and connected to a device if it does not have one built in.
Predicted amount of electricity needed to operate the product under average conditions for one year.
The number and type of connectors used to connect to an external display.

The Electronic Product Environmental Assessment Tool (EPEAT) was designed to provide an environmental assessment tool for purchasers. In order to qualify for EPEAT, a product must meet all 23 required criteria.
VESA wall mount standards refer to the spacing of screw holes built into a TV in order to fit with standard TV wall mounts. These standards are implemented into most TVs and monitors.
Casts the screen of one device onto another wirelessly, using a common protocol (typically Bluetooth).

Just like a computer, a smart TV needs an operating system (also called a smart platform) in order to access the Internet, connect with entertainment apps, and play streaming content. Some common TV smart platforms are; Roku TV, Android TV, and Chromecast.
Whether the stand can adjust to have more than one measurement either between the legs or the base itself.
Streaming services and other programs are available on this device. Keep in mind, there may be more services supported than just those shown here.
Size of the screen, measured diagonally from corner to corner.
The number of frames per second the device can produce natively without enhancement. Higher rates help produce smooth, seamless pictures.

features.title: The smart TV that makes sense
features.description: Roku Select Series 4K TVs are built by Roku to bring viewers a brilliant streaming experience with superior picture quality at an incredible value.

features.title: Made by Roku
features.description: From the brand you trust to make streaming easier comes a thoughtfully designed smart TV powered by the delightfully simple Roku experience.

features.title: Brilliant 4K picture
features.description: Stunningly sharp 4K resolution brings out the rich detail in your entertainment with four times the resolution of HD.

features.title: Color that pops
features.description: Watch in incredible HDR10+ color, contrast, and brightness that brings your favorite entertainment to life.

features.title: Automatic brightness
features.description: Avoid fiddling with settings with a screen that automatically adjusts based on your room’s lighting.

features.title: Designed for seamless streaming
features.description: With features like fast Wi-Fi® and channels that launch in a snap, Roku Select TVs get you to your entertainment quick and easy.

features.title: Customizable home screen
features.description: Roku smart TVs put your favorites channels, inputs, and free live TV front and center, so you can spend your time streaming—not scrolling.

features.title: Endless free TV
features.description: Enjoy the best selection of free entertainment with 350+ live TV channels, award-winning Roku® Originals, in-season shows, hit movies, kids’ TV, and more.

features.title: Stream what you love
features.description: Enjoy the most popular channels plus a massive selection of free and live TV, including news, sports, and family entertainment.

features.title: Enhanced voice remote
features.description: Search with your voice, enjoy private listening, set personal shortcuts for your favorite channels, and find your remote with lost remote finder.

features.title: How sound should sound
features.description: Not all TV speakers are created equal. Roku Select Series TVs with Dolby Audio® built-in speakers are designed for clear speech and louder sound so you can catch every word.

features.title: Your TV is mission control
features.description: Easily connect your Roku cameras and doorbell to your Roku smart TV and view your feeds right on the big screen with the push of a button. photographers or upload your personal photos.

features.title: A perfect fit for any smart home
features.description: Roku smart TVs seamlessly fit into any smart home ecosystem and are compatible with all major voice assistants.

features.title: State of the art
features.description: With Roku Backdrops, your TV screen becomes an aesthetic gallery featuring art and photos of your choice. Choose from collections of famous artists and professional photographers or upload your personal photos.

features.title: Your best-looking TV ever
features.description: See more of the show and less of the hardware with a sleek, frameless design that instantly modernizes your entertainment setup.

features.title: Share it with Apple AirPlay
features.description: Effortlessly share videos, photos, music, and more from your Apple device to your TV in a tap.
Web-based services and content require high-speed Internet service. Some services may require a subscription.
